1a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yum ga pa bzhugs ste//
1b1('bum): / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ dam bu gsum pa/ bam
1b2('bum): po dang po'o// rlung stong pa nyid la mi spyod de/ nang stong pa nyid kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod
1b3('bum): cing / nang stong pa nyid rtag ces bya bar mi sbyang / nang stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar mi
1b4('bum): spyod/ nang stong pa nyid bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ nang stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar
1b5('bum): mi spyod/ nang stong pa nyid bdag ces bya bor mi spyod/ nang stong po nyid bdag ces bya bar mi
2a1('bum): spyod/ nang stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ nang stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ nang stong pa nyid stong
2a2('bum): zhes bya bar mi spyod/ nang stong pa nyid mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ nang stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ nang stong pa
2a3('bum): zhing mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ nang stong pa nyid smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ nang stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar mi
2a4('bum): spyod/ nang stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ nang stong pa nyid mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / byi stong pa nyid la mi spyod de/
2a5('bum): phyi stong pa nyid kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / phyi stong pa nyid rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ phyi stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ phyi stong
2a6('bum): ba nyid bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ phyi stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ phyi stong pa nyid bdag ces par mi spyod/
2b1('bum): phyi stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ byi stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar ma spyod/ phyi stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ phyi stong pa nyid stong zhes
2b2('bum): bya bar mi spyod/ byi stong pa nyid mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ byi stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ phyi stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces
2b3('bum): bya bar mi spyod/ phyi stong pa nyid smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ phyi stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ phyi stong pa nyid
2b4('bum): dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ phyi stong pa nyid mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang // phyi nang stong pa nyid la mi spyod de/
2b5('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing // phyi nang stong pa nyid rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ phyi nang stong pa mi rtag ces
2b6('bum): bya bar mi spyod/ phyi nang stong pa nyid bde zhes bya bar mi spyod// phyi nang stong pa
2b7('bum): sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod// phyi nang stong pa nyid bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/
3a1('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ phyi nang stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ phyi nang stong
3a2('bum): pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ phyi nang stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ phyi nang stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ phyi nang stong pa nyid mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/
3a3('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid mtshan mo yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ phyi nang stong pa nyid mtshan ma mod ces bya bar mi spyod/ phyi nang stong po nyid yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ phyi nang stong pa nyid
3a4('bum): smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ phyi nang stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ phyi nang stong pa nyid mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyong pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la mi spyod
3a5('bum): de/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / stong pa nyid stong po nyid rtag ces bya bar mi spod / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar mi spong / stong po
3a6('bum): nyid stong pa nyid bde zhes bya bar mi spong / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ stong
3a7('bum): nyid stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar mi spong / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spong / stong pa nyid
3b1('bum): stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ stong pa nyid/
3b2('bum): stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spong / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar mi spong //
3b3('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid la mi spyod de/ chen po stong pa
3b4('bum): nyid kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / chen po stong pa nyid rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ chen po stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ chen po stong pa nyid bde zhes bya bar
3b5('bum): mi spyod/ chen po stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ chen po stong pa nyid bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ chen po stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/
3b6('bum): chen po stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar mi spong / chen po stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ chen po stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ chen po stong pa nyid mo stong
3b7('bum): zhes bya bar mi spyod/ chen po stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ chen po stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ chen po stong pa nyid smon pa yod
4a1('bum): ces bya bar mi spyod/ chen po stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ chen po stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ chen po stong pa
4a2('bum): nyid mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid la mi spod de/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan ma la mi sprod cing / don dam pa stong pa nyid rtag ces pa
4a3('bum): bar mi spyod/ don dam po stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ don dam pa stong pa nyid bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ don dam pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi
4a4('bum): spyod/ don dam pa stong pa nyid bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ don dam pa stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ don dam pa stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar mi spong / don dam
4a5('bum): pa stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ don dam pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar mi spong / don dam pa stong pa nyid mi stong zhes bya bar mi spong / don dam pa stong pa nyid
4a6('bum): mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ don dam pa stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bor mi spong / don dam pa stong pa nyid sngon po yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ don dam pa
4a7('bum): stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ don dam pa stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar mo spyod/ don dam pa stong pa nyid mi dben zhes bya bar mi spong pa dang / 'dus pas
4b1('bum): stong pa nyid la mi spyod de/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / 'dus byas stong pa nyid rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya
4b2('bum): bar mi spyod/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid bdag ces bya bar mi
4b3('bum): spyod/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ 'dus byas
4b4('bum): stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid mi stong zhes bya bar mi spong / 'dus byas stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid
4b5('bum): mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid smon pa yod ces bya ba ro mi spyod/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ 'dus byas stong pa
4b6('bum): nyid dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la mi spyod de/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi
4b7('bum): mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid rtag ces bya bar mi sbyong / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid bde zhes/
5a1('bum): bya bar mi spyod/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ 'dus ma
5a2('bum): byas stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ 'dus ma byas stong
5a3('bum): pa nyid stong zhes bya bar mi spod/ 'dus ma byas stong nyid mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ 'dus ma byas stong
5a4('bum): pa nyid mtshan ma mod ces bya bar mi spyod/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spong / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ 'dus ma
5a5('bum): byas stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la mi spyod de/ mtha' las
5a6('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bya bar mi sbyong / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar mi spod/
5a7('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bde zhes bya bar mi spong / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bdag ces
5b1('bum): bya bar mi spyod/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa
5b2('bum): nyid ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar mi spod/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod / mtha' las
5b3('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spong / mtha' las 'das pa stong po nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spod/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid smon pa
5b4('bum): yod ces bya bar mi spod/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ mtha' las 'das po stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar mi spong / mtha'
5b5('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid mi dben zhes bya bar mi spong pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la mi spong de/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan ma la mi
5b6('bum): spyod cing / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid rtog ces bya bar mi spyod/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa
5b7('bum): stong pa nyid bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/
6a1('bum): @thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ thog ma dang
6a2('bum): ma med pa stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mi spong bya bar mi spyod/ thog ma
6a3('bum): dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spong / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid smon pa yod
6a4('bum): ces bya bar mi spyod/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ thog ma dang ba ma med pa stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa sto
6a5('bum): pa nyid mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la mi spyod de/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bya bar mi spyong
6a6('bum): dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid
6a7('bum): bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar mi sbyong / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar mi spyong / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod /
6b1('bum): dor ba med pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mi stong zhes bya bar mi skyong / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spong / dor ba med pa stong pa
6b2('bum): nying mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi sbyong / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spong / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar mi spod/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid
6b3('bum): dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid la mi spyod de/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / rang bzhin
6b4('bum): stong pa nyid rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rang bzhin stong ba nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi
6b5('bum): spong rang bzhin stong pa nyid bdag ces bya bar mi spong / rang bzhin stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid
6b6('bum): ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi
6b7('bum): spyod/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/
7a1('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar mi spong / rang bzhin stong pa nyid mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid la mi spyod de/
7a2('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi mtshan ma la mi spod cing / chos thams cad stong pa nyid rtag ces bya bar mi spong / chos thams cad stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ chos thams
7a3('bum): cad stong pa nyid bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ chos thams cad stong
7a4('bum): pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar mi spong / chos thams cad stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spod/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid stong zhes
7a5('bum): bya bar mi spod/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid mi stong zhes bya bar mi spong/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spong / chos thams cad stong pa nyid mtshan ma med
7a6('bum): ces bya bar mi spyod/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid ston pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid dben
7a7('bum): zhes bya bar mi spyod/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid mi dben zhes bya bar mi spong ba dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la mi spyod de/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod/
7b1('bum): cing / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rang /
7b2('bum): gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar mi spong /
7b3('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rang gi mtshan nyid ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rang gi mtshan nyid
7b4('bum): stong pa nyid mi stong zhes bya bar mi spong / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spong / rang
7b5('bum): gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid smon pa yod ces bya bar mi sbyong / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar mi
7b6('bum): spyod/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la mi spyod de/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing /
7b7('bum): dmigs pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mi dmigs
8a1('bum): bstong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid bdag med
8a2('bum): ces bya bar mi spyod/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spong / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mi dmig pa
8a3('bum): pa nyid mi ston \u0f7fga/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spong / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid smon pa yod ces
8a4('bum): bya bar mi spyod/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mi dben zhes bya
8a5('bum): bar mi spyod pa dang // dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la mi spyod de/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bya bar mi
8a6('bum): spyod/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar/
8a7('bum): mi sbyong / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar mi/
8b1('bum): spyod/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid spong bya bar mi spyod/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ dngos
8b2('bum): po med pa stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi sbyong / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi sbyong / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid smon pa yod ces bya bar mi
8b3('bum): spong / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar mi spong / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dpon zhes bya bar mi spyod/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mi dben zhes bya bar
8b4('bum): mi spyod pa dang // ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mi spyod do/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
8b5('bum): mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bde zhes bya bar mi spong / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bdag ces bya bar mi
8b6('bum): spyod/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyong / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ ngo bo nyid stong
8b7('bum): pa nyid stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mtshan
9a1('bum): ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ ngo bo
9a2('bum): nyid stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang // dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mi spyod de/ dngos po med
9a3('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rtag ces bya bar mi stong / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya
9a4('bum): bar mi spod/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spong / dngos po med pa'i ngo
9a5('bum): bo nyid stong pa nyid bdag ces bya bar mi spong / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar mi spong / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar
9a6('bum): mi spod/ dngos po med po'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spong / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar mi spod/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
9a7('bum): nyid mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spong / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar
9b1('bum): mi spyod/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar mi sbyong / dngos po med pa'i
9b2('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la mi spyod de/ dran
9b3('bum): pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/
9b4('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams bdag ces
9b5('bum): bya bar mi spyod/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams zhi zhes bya bar mi sbyong / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma
9b6('bum): zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams
9b7('bum): mtshan mo yod ces bya bar mi spyong / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi sbyong / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams smon po yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ dran pa
10a1('bum): bar gzhag pa rnams smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa
10a2('bum): rnams mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams la mi spyod de/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / yang dag par spong ba rnams rtag
10a3('bum): ces bya bar mi spyod/ yang dag par spong ba rnams mi rtag ces bya bar mi sbyong / yang dag par spong ba rnams bde zhes bya bar mi spong / yang dag par spong ba rnams sdug bsngal zhes/
10a4('bum): bya bar mi spyod/ yang dag par spong ba rnams bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ yang dag par spong ba rnams bdag med ces bya bar mi spod/ yang dag par spong ba rnams zhi zhes bya bar
10a5('bum): mi spong / yang dag par spong ba rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ yang dag par spong ba rnams stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ yang dag par spong ba rnams mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/
10a6('bum): yang dag par spong ba rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ yang dag par spong ba rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ yang dag par spong ba rnams smon pa yod ces
10a7('bum): bya bar mi spyod/ yang dag par spong ba rnams smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ yang dag par spong ba rnams dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ yang dag par spong ba rnams mi
10b1('bum): dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la mi spyod de/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams rtag ces bya
10b2('bum): bar mi spyod/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sdug bsngal
10b3('bum): zhes bya bar mi spong / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams bdag med ces bya bar mi sbyong / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams zhi zhes
10b4('bum): bya bar mi spyod/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/
10b5('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mtshan med ces bya bar mi spyod/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/
10b6('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dben zhes bya bar mi spyong / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / dbang
10b7('bum): po rnams la mi spyod de/ dbang po rnams kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / dbang po rnams rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ dbang po rnams mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ dbang po rnams bde
11a1('bum): zhes bya bar mi spyod/ dbang po rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ dbang po rnams bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ dbang po rnams bdag med ces bya bar/
11a2('bum): mi spong/ dbang po rnams zhi zhes bya bar mi spong/ dbang po rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spong / dbang po rnams stong zhes bya bar mi spong / dbang po rnams mi stong zhes bya bar mi spod//
11a3('bum): dbang po rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ dab rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spong / dbang po rnams smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spong / dbang po rnams smon pa med ces
11a4('bum): bya bar mi spyod/ dbang po rnams dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ dbang po rnams mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang // stobs rnams la mi spyod de/ stobs rnams kyi mtshan ma la mi
11a5('bum): spyod cing / stobs rnams rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ stobs rnams mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ stobs rnams bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ stobs rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya
11a6('bum): bar mi spyod/ stobs rnams bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ stobs rnams bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ stobs rnams zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ stobs rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar mi
11a7('bum): spyod/ stobs rnams stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ stobs rnams mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ stobs rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ stobs rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar
11b1('bum): mi spyod/ stobs rnams smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ stobs rnams smon pa med ces bya bar mi sbyong / stobs rnams dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ stobs rnams mi dben zhes
11b2('bum): bya bar mi spyod pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la mi spyod de/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams rtag ces bya bar mi spyod//
11b3('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ byang
11b4('bum): chub kyi yan lag rnams dag ces bya bar mi spyod/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bag med ces bya bar mi spong / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ byang chub kyi yan
11b5('bum): lag rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar mi skyed/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams/
11b6('bum): mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams
11b7('bum): smon pa med ces bya bar mi spod/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dben zhes bya bar mi spong / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang // 'phags pa'i lam yan
12a1('bum): lag brgyad pa la mi spyod de// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa rtag ces
12a2('bum): bya bar mi spyod/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag rgyad pa mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
12a3('bum): pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bdag med ces bya bar mi spongad / 'jag
12a4('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/
12a5('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
12a6('bum): pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/
12a7('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dben zhes bya bar mi spong / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag rgyad po mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la mi spyod de/
12b1('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ 'phags
12b2('bum): pa'i bden pa rnams bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ 'phags pa'i
12b3('bum): bden pa rnams bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ 'phags pa'i
12b4('bum): bden pa rnams stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ 'phags
12b5('bum): pa'i bden pa rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi sprod/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spong / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ 'phags
12b6('bum): pa'i bden pa rnams dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang // bsam gtan rnams la mi spyod de/ bsam gtan rnams kyi
12b7('bum): mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / bsam gtan rnams rtag ces bya bar mi sbyong / bsam gtan rnams mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ bsam gtan rnams bde zhes bya bar mi spyong / bsam
13a1('bum): gtan rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ bsam gtan rnams bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ bsam gtan rnams bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod//
13a2('bum): bsam gtan rnams zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ bsam gtan rnams mo zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ bsam gtan rnams stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ bsam gtan rnams mi stong zhes
13a3('bum): bya bar mi spyod/ bsam gtan rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyong / bsam gtan rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ bsam gtan rnams smon pa yod ces
13a4('bum): bya bar mi spyod/ bsam gtan rnams smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ bsam gtan rnams dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ bsam gtan rnams mi dben zhes bya bar mi
13a5('bum): spyod pa dang // tshad med pa rnams la mi spyod de/ tshad med pa rnams kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / tshad med po rnams rtag ces bya bar mi spong / tshad med pa rnams
13a6('bum): mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ tshad med pa rnams bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ tshad med pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spong / tshad med pa rnams bdag ces bya bar mi
13a7('bum): spyod/ tshad med pa rnams bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ tshad med pa rnams zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ tshad med pa rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ tshad med pa rnams
13b1('bum): stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ tshad med pa rnams mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyong / tshad med pa rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ tshad med pa rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar
13b2('bum): mi spyod/ tshad med pa rnams smon yod ces bya bar mi spong / tshad med pa rnams smon pa med ces bya bar mi spod / tshad med pa rnams dben zhes bya bar mi spod/ tshad med pa
13b3('bum): rnams mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mi spyod de/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi mtshan ma la mi
13b4('bum): spyod cing / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ gzug
13b5('bum): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms
13b6('bum): par 'jug pa rnams bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
13b7('bum): rnams zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams stong zhes
14a1('bum): zhes bya bar mi spyod/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ gzugs bla'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
14a2('bum): mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams smon pa yod
14a3('bum): ces bya bar mi spyod/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/
14a4('bum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms 'jug pa rnams mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / rnam par thar pa rnams la mi spyod de/ rnam par thar pa rnams kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / rnam
14a5('bum): par thar pa rnams rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par thar pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par thar pa rnams bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par thar pa rnams sdug
14a6('bum): bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par thar pa rnams bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par thar pa rnams bdag med ces bya bar mi spod / rnam par thar pa rnams zhi zhes bya bar/
14a7('bum): mi spyod/ rnam par thar pa rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spong / rnam par thar pa rnams stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par thar pa rnams mi stong zhes bya bar mi spong / rnam
14b1('bum): rnam par thar pa rnam smon pa yod ces bya
14b2('bum): par thar pa rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par thar pa rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par thar pa rnams smin pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par
14b3('bum): thar pa rnams dben zhes bya bar mi spyong / rnam par thar pa rnams mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang // mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mi spyod de/ mthar
14b4('bum): gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i
14b5('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar mi spong / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
14b6('bum): pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mthor gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
14b7('bum): bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar mi
14b8('bum): spyod/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams stong zhes bya bar mi stod/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mthar gyis
15a1('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mtshan ma med ces bya
15a2('bum): bar mi spyod/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spod/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams smon pa med ces bya bar mi
15a3('bum): spyod/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang /
15a4('bum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa la mi spyod de/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i
15a5('bum): tshan ma la mi spyod cing / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rtag ces bya bar mi spyong / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
15a6('bum): mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/
15a7('bum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang /
15b1('bum): smon pa med pa bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par thar pa'i
15b2('bum): sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par bya'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ma zhi zhes bya bar mi
15b3('bum): spyod/ rnam par pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa mi
15b4('bum): stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
15b5('bum): mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spong / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spong//
15b6('bum): par thar pa'i sgra sdang ba nyid dang / mtshan ma meng pa dang sman pa med bsnan pa yang cas / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa/
15b7('bum): smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa dben zhes bya bar mi sbyong / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
16a1('bum): mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa mi dben zhes bya bar mi spod pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la mi spyod de/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyi
16a2('bum): mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / mngon par shes pa rnams rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ mngon par shes pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ mngon par shes pa rnams bde zhes bya
16a3('bum): bar mi spyod/ mngon par shes pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mngon par shes pa rnams bdag ces bya bar mi spong / mngon par shes pa rnams bdag med ces bya
16a4('bum): bar mi spyod/ mngon par shes pa rnams zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod / mngon par shes pa rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mngon par shes pa rnams stong zhes bya bar mi spong/
16a5('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams mi stong zhes bya bar mi spong / mngon par shes pa rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi sbyong / mngon par shes pa rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spong
16a6('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod / mngon par shes pa rnams smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ mngon par shes pa rnams dben zhes bya bar mi sbyong / mtsho
16a7('bum): par shes pa rnams mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang // ting nge 'dzini rnams la mi spyod de/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / ting nge 'dzin rnams brtag ces
16b1('bum): bya bar mi spyod/ ting nge 'dzin rnams mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ ting nge 'dzin rnams bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ ting nge 'dzin rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ ting nge
16b2('bum): 'dzin rnams bdag ces bya bar mi spong / ting nge 'dzin rnams bdag med ces bya bar mi spod / ting nge 'dzin rnams zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ ting nge 'dzin rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar mi
16b3('bum): spyod/ ting nge 'dzin rnams stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ ting nge 'dzin rnams mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ ting nge 'dzin rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ ting nge 'dzin
16b4('bum): rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ ting nge 'dzin rnams smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ ting nge 'dzin rnams smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ ting nge 'dzin rnams dben
16b5('bum): zhes bya bar mi spong / ting nge 'dzin rnams mi dben zhes bya bar mi spong pa dang // gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mi spyod de/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing //
16b6('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams bde zhes bya bar mi spod/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams sdug ba
16b7('bum): zhes bya bar mi spyod/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/
17a1('bum): bya/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spong / gzungs kyi sgo rnams stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ gzungs
17a2('bum): kyi sgo rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams smon
17a3('bum): pa me ces bya bar mi spong / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la mi spyod de/
17a4('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams mi rtag ces bya
17a5('bum): bar mi spod/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams bde zhes bya bar mi spong / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spod/ de bzhin gshes pa'i stobs rnam
17a6('bum): bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams zhi zhes bya bar mi stod / de bzhin gshegs
17a7('bum): pa'i stobs rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams stong zhes bya bar mi spod/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/
17b1('bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spod/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams
17b2('bum): smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ de bzhin
17b3('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs rnams mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang // mi 'jigs pa rnams la mi spyod de/ mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / mi 'jigs pa rnams rtag
17b4('bum): ces bya bar mi spyod / mi 'jigs pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ mi 'jigs pa rnams bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mi 'jigs pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mi
17b5('bum): 'jigs pa rnams bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ mi 'jigs pa rnams bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ mi 'jigs pa rnams zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mi 'jigs pa rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar
17b6('bum): mi spyod/ mi 'jigs pa rnams spong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mi 'jigs pa rnams mi stong zhes bya bar mo spyod/ mi 'jigs pa rnams mtshas yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ mi 'jigs pa rnams mtshan ma
17b7('bum): med ces bya bar mi spyod/ mi 'jigs pa rnams smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ mi 'jigs pa rnams smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod / mi 'jigs pa rnams dben zhes bya bar mi sbyong / mi 'jig
17b8('bum): pa rnams mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang // so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la mi spyod de/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / so so yang dag par rig
18a1('bum): pa rnams rtag ces bya bar mi spyong / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ so so yang
18a2('bum): dag par rig pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/
18a3('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa rnams zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spong / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ so so yang
18a4('bum): dag par rig pa rnams mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnam mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/ so so
18a5('bum): yang dag par rig pa rnam smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spong/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnam smon pa med ces bya bar mi spong/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnam dben zhes bya bar mi spod/ so so yang
18a6('bum): dag par rig pa rnam mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang // snying rje chen po la mi spyod de/ snying rje chen po'i mtshan ma mi spyod cing / snying rje chen po rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ snying rje chen po mi rtag ces
18a7('bum): bya bar mi spyod/ snying rje chen po bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ snying rje chen po sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/ snying rje chen po bdag ces bya bar mi spyod/ snying rje chen po bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ snying rje
18a8('bum): chen po zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ snying rje chen po ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ snying rje chen po stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ snying rje chen po mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ snying rje chen po mtshan ma yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ snying
18b1('bum): rje chen po mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi sbyong / snying rje chen po smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/ snying rje chen po smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ snying rje chen po dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ snying rje chen po mi dben
18b2('bum): zhes bya bar mi spyong ba dang // sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la mi spyod de/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma dris pa bco brgyad kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod cing / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rtag
18b3('bum): ces bya ba mi spyod/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mi rtag ces bya ba mi spyod/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bde zhes bya bar mi spyod/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad sdug bsngal
18b4('bum): zhes bya bar mi spyod/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bdag ces bya ba mi spyod/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad zhi zhes
18b5('bum): bya bar mi spong / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ma zhi zhes bya ba mi spyod/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dre ba bco brgyad stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dre ba bco brgyad mi stong zhes bya ba mi spyod/
18b6('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dre ba bco brgya mtshan ma yod ces bya ba mi spyod/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dre ba bco brgyad mtshan ma med ce bya bar mi sbyod/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dre ba bco brgyad smon pa yod ces bya bar mi spyod/
18b7('bum): sangs rgyas kyi ma 'dre bco brgyad smon pa med ces bya ba mi spyod/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dben zhes bya bar mi spong / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa
18b8('bum): de'i tshe// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas par shes par bya'o// / bam po gnyis pa'o//
19a1('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang gzugs ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang gzugs med/ gzug
19a2('bum): las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang gzugs/ gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// tshor ba'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang tshor ba ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang tshor
19a3('bum): ba med/ tshor ba las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba/ tshor nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// 'du shes kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang 'du shes ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud
19a4('bum): na'ang 'du shes med/ 'du shes las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang 'du shes/ 'du shes nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// 'du byed kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang 'du byed ma yin/ steng
19a5('bum): pa nyid las gud na'ang 'du byed med/ 'du byed las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed/ 'du byed nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang yid pa de'ang rnam par
19a6('bum): shes pa ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang rnam par shes pa med/ rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//
19a7('bum): mig gi stong pa nyid gang yin pade'ang migs yin/ stong pa nyid las gung na'ang mig med// mig las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang mig/ mig nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// rna ba'i spong pa nyid
19b1('bum): gang yin pa de'ang rna ba ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang rna ba med/ rna ba las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang rna ba/ rna ba'i nyid kyang stong nyid do// sna'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang snam
19b2('bum): yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang sna med/ sna las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang sna/ sna nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// lce'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang lce ma yin/ stong pa nyid las
19b3('bum): gud na'ang lce med/ lce las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang lce/ lce nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// lus kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang lus ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang lus
19b4('bum): med/ lus las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang lus/ lus nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// yid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang yid ma yin stong pa nyid las gud na'ang yid med/ yid
19b5('bum): las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang yid/ yid nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang gzugs ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang gzugs med/
19b6('bum): gzugs las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang gzugs/ gzugs nyid kyang stong nyid do// sgra'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang smra ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang sgra med/
19b7('bum): sgra las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang sgra/ snga nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// dri'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang dri ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang dri med/ dri las gud na'ang stong
20a1('bum): pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang dri/ dri nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// ro'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang rom yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang ro med/ ro las gud na'ang
20a2('bum): stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang ro// ro nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// reg gi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang reg ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang reg med/ reg las gud na'ang stong pa nyid
20a3('bum): med de/ stong pa nyid kyang reg/ reg nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// chos kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang chos ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang chos med/ chos las gud na'ang stong pa nyid
20a4('bum): med de/ stong pa nyid kyang chos/ chos nyid kyang stong nyid do// mig gi khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang mig gi khams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang mig gi khams med/ mig gi
20a5('bum): khams las gud na'ang / stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang mig gi khams/ mig gi khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// gzugs kyi khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang gzugs kyi khams ma
20a6('bum): yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang gzugs kyi khams med/ gzugs kyi khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid de/ stong pa nyid kyang gzugs kyi khams/ gzugs kyi khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//
20a7('bum): mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams med/ mig rnam par
20b1('bum): shes pa'i khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams/ mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// rna ba'i khams kyi stong pa
20b2('bum): nyid gang yin pa de'ang rna ba'i khams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang rna ba'i khams med/ rna ba'i khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang rna ba'i khams rna ba'i khams
20b3('bum): nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// sgra'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang sgra'i khams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang sgra'i khams med/ sgra'i khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/
20b4('bum): stong pa nyid kyang sgra'i khams/ sgra'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin/ stong pa
20b5('bum): nyid las gud na'ang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams med/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams las gung na'ang stong ba nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams/ na
20b6('bum): ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// sna'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang sna'i khams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang sna'i khams med/ sna'i khams
20b7('bum): las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang sna'i khams/ sna'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// dri'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang dri'i khams ma yin/ stong pa nyid
21a1('bum): las gud na 'ang dri'i khams med/ dri'i khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang dri'i khams/ dri'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// sna'i
21a2('bum): rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams med/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i
21a3('bum): khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// lce'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin/
21a4('bum): pa de yang lce'i khams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang lce'i khams med/ lce'i khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang lce'i khams/ lce'i khams nyid kyang stong
21a5('bum): pa nyid do// ro'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang ro'i khams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang ro'i khams med/ re'i khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid
21a6('bum): kyang ro'i khams/ ro'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin/ stong pa nyid la gud na 'ang
21a7('bum): lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams med/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid
21b1('bum): kyang stong pa nyid do// lus kyi khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang lus kyi khams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang lus kyi khams med/ lus kyi khams las gud na'ang stong pa
21b2('bum): nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang lus kyi khams/ lus kyi khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// reg gi khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang reg gi khams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud
21b3('bum): na'ang reg gi khams med/ reg gi khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang reg gi khams/ reg gi khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i kham
21b4('bum): kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams med/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams las
21b5('bum): gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// yid kyi khams kyi stong pa nyid gang
21b6('bum): yin pa de yang / yid kyi khams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang yid kyi khams med/ yid kyi khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang yid khams/ yid kyi
21b7('bum): nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// chos kyi khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang chos kyi khams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang chos kyi khams med/ chos kyi khams las gu
22a1('bum): na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi khams/ chos kyi khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa
22a2('bum): de'ang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams med/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/
22a3('bum): stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// sa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang sa'i khams ma yin/
22a4('bum): stong pa nyid las gud na'ang sa'i khams med/ sa'i khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang sa'i khams/ sa'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// chu'i khams
22a5('bum): kyi stong pa nyid gadru ba de'ang chu'i khams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang chu'i khams med/ chu'i khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang chu'i khams/ chu'i khams
22a6('bum): nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// me'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang me'i khams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang me'i khams med/ me'i khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/
22a7('bum): stong pa nyid kyang me'i khams/ me'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// rlung gi khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang rlung gi khams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang rlung gi khams med/
22b1('bum): rlung gi khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang rlung gi khams/ rlung gi khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// nam mkha'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang nam mkha'i
22b2('bum): khams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang nam mkha'i khams med/ nam mkha'i khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang nam mkha'i khams/ nam mkha'i khams nyid
22b3('bum): kyang stong pa nyid do// rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi/ stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang rnam par shes pa'i khams med/ rnam par
22b4('bum): shes pa'i khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'i khams/ rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// ma rig pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa
22b5('bum): de yang ma rig pa ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang ma rig pa med/ ma rig pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang ma rig pa/ ma rig pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// 'du
22b6('bum): byed kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang 'du byed ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang 'du byed med/ 'du byed las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed/ 'du byed nyid kyang stong
22b7('bum): pa nyid do// rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang rnam par shes pa ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang rnam par shes pa med/ rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/
23a1('bum): stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// ming dang gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pade'ang ming dang gzugs ma yin/ stong pa/
23a2('bum): nyid las gud na'ang ming dang gzugs med/ ming dang gzugs las gud na'ang stong pa nyid de/ stong pa nyid kyang ming dang gzugs ming dang gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// skye mched drug gi stong /
23a3('bum): pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang skye mched drug ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang skye mched drug med/ skye mched drug las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang skye mched drug/ skye mched
23a4('bum): drug nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// reg pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang reg pa ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang reg pa med/ reg pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang reg pa/
23a5('bum): reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// tshor ba'i stong nyid gang yin pa de'ang tshor ba ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang tshor ba med/ tshor ba las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba/
23a6('bum): tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// sred pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang sred pa ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang sred pa med/ sred pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang
23a7('bum): sred pa sred pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// len pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang len pa ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang len pa med/ len pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/
23b1('bum): stong pa nyid kyang len pa/ len pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// sred pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang sred pa ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang srid pa med/ srid pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid
23b2('bum): med de/ stong pa nyid kyang srid pa/ srid pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// skye ba'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang skye ba ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang skye ba med/ skye ba las gud na'ang stong pa nyid
23b3('bum): med de/ stong pa nyid kyang skye ba skye ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// rga shi'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang rga shi ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang rga shi med/ rga shi las gud na'ang stong pa
23b4('bum): nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang rga shi rga shi nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na
23b5('bum): 'ang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong
23b6('bum): pa nyid do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med//
23b7('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// bzod
24a1('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med/
24a2('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// brtson 'grus/
24a3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu bla ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
24a4('bum): tu phyin pa las gud na 'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// bsam gtan gyi pha
24a5('bum): rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa med/ bsam gtan gyi pha
24a6('bum): rol tu phyin pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// shes rab kyi
24a7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
24b1('bum): pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// nang stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin
24b2('bum): ba de'ang nang stong pa nyid ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang nang stong pa nyid med/ nang stong pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid de/ stong pa nyid kyang nang stong pa nyid/ nang stong
24b3('bum): pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// phyi stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang phyi stong pa nyid ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang phyi stong pa nyid med/ phyi stong pa nyid las gud na
24b4('bum): 'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang phyi stong pa nyid/ phyi stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang phyi nang stong pa nyid ma yin/
24b5('bum): stong pa nyid las gud na'ang phyi nang stong pa nyid med/ phyi nang stong pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang stong pa
24b6('bum): nyid do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid med/ stong pa nyid
24b7('bum): stong pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// chen po stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang
25a1('bum): yin pa de'ang / chen po stong pa nyid ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang chen po stong pa nyid med/ chen po stong pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/
25a2('bum): stong pa nyid kyang chen po stong pa nyid/ chen po stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang don dam pa stong pa ma yin/ stong pa nyid
25a3('bum): las gud na'ang don dam pa stong pa nyid med/ don dam pa stong pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang stong
25a4('bum): pa nyid do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang 'dus byas stong pa nyid ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang 'dus byas stong pa nyid med 'dus byas stong
25a5('bum): pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// 'dus byas spong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang
25a6('bum): yin pa de'ang 'dus ma byas stong pa ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid med/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa
25a7('bum): nyid kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang mtha' las 'das pa stong
25b1('bum): pa nyid ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid med/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang mtha'
25b2('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa
25b3('bum): nyid ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid med/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang thog ma
25b4('bum): dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ma yin//
25b5('bum): stong pa nyid las gud na'ang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid med/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid/ 7/ rang
25b6('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid med/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid las gud na
25b7('bum): 'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang
25b8('bum): kye dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid//
26a1('bum): / chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma yin/ stong pa las gud na'ang chos thams cad stong pa nyid med/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid las gung na'ang stong
26a2('bum): pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin
26a3('bum): bde'ang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid med/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid
26a4('bum): med de/ stong pa nyid kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang
26a5('bum): mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid med/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid
26a6('bum): kyang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ma
26a7('bum): yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid med/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid/
26b1('bum): dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid med/
26b2('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
26b3('bum): kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang dngos po med ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid med/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
26b4('bum): nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// dran pa nye bar gzhag
26b5('bum): pa bzhi'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams med/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams las
26b6('bum): gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nyid kyang stong nyid do// yang dag par spong ba bzhi'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang yang dag
26b7('bum): par spong ba rnams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang yang dag par spong ba rnams med/ yang dag par spong ba rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang yang dag par
27a1('bum): spong ba/ yang dag par spong ba nyid stong pa nyid do// rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa bzhi'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma yin/ stong pa
27a2('bum): las gud na'ang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams med/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa nyid kyang stong
27a3('bum): pa nyid do// dbang po lnga'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang dbang po rnams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang dbang po rnams med/ dbang po rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/
27a4('bum): stong pa nyid kyang dbang po dbang po nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stobs lnga'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang stobs rnams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang stobs rnams med/ stobs
27a5('bum): rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang stobs/ stobs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang / byang chub kyi yan
27a6('bum): lag rnams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams med// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang byang chub tu
27a7('bum): yan lag/ byang chub kyi yan lag nyid kyang stong po nyid do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma
27b1('bum): yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa med/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de stong pa nyid kyang 'phags pi
27b2('bum): lam yan lag brgyad pa/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma
27b3('bum): yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams med/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa
27b4('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// bsam gtan bzhi'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang / bsam gtan rnams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang bsam
27b5('bum): gtan rnams med/ bsam gtan rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang bsam gtan/ bsam gtan nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// tshad med pa bzhi'i
27b6('bum): stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang tshad med pa rnams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang tshad med pa rnams med/ tshad med pa rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa
27b7('bum): nyid kyang tshad med pa tshad med pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
28a1('bum): rnams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams med/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
28a2('bum): las gud na'ang / stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// rnam
28a3('bum): par thar pa brgyad kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang rnam par thar pa ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang rnam par thar pa med/ rnam par thar pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/
28a4('bum): stong pa nyid kyang rnam par thar pa/ rnam par thar pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang / mthar gyis
28a5('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams med/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
28a6('bum): pa rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams nyid kyang
28a7('bum): stong pa nyid do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med
28b1('bum): pa dang / smon pa med pa ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa med/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang
28b2('bum): mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa/ rnam par
28b3('bum): thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// mngon par shes pa drug gi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang / mngon par shes pa
28b4('bum): rnams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang mngon par shes pa rnams med/ mngon par shes pa rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang mngon par shes
28b5('bum): pa rnams// mngon par shes pa rnams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang ting nge 'dzin rnams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na
28b6('bum): 'ang ting nge 'dzin rnams med/ ting nge 'dzin rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams/ ting nge 'dzin rnams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//
28b7('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang gzungs kyi sgo rnams med/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams las gud na'ang /
29a1('bum): stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i
29a2('bum): stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams med/ de bzhin
29a3('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid de// stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// mi
29a4('bum): 'jigs pa bzhi'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang / mi 'jigs pa rnams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang mi 'jigs pa rnams med/ mi 'jigs pa rnams las gud
29a5('bum): na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang mi 'jigs pa/ mi 'jigs pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa'ang / so so
29a6('bum): yang dag par rig pa rnams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams med/ so so yang drug par rig pa rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/
29a7('bum): stong pa nyid kyang so so yang dag par rig pa/ so so yang dag par rig pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// bams pa chen po'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang byams pa chen po ma yin/
29b1('bum): stong pa nyid las gud na'ang byams pa chen po med/ byams pa chen po las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang byams pa chen po// byams pa chen po nyid kyang
29b2('bum): stong pa nyid do// snying rje chen po'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang snying rje chen po ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang snying rje chen po med/ snying rje chen po las gud na'ang stong
29b3('bum): pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang snying rje chen po// snying rje chen po nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang sangs
29b4('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams med/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams las gud na'ang stong
29b5('bum): pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// thams cad shes pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de
29b6('bum): 'ang thams cad shes pa nyid ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang thams cad shes pa nyid med/ thams cad shes pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang
29b7('bum): thams cad shes pa nyid thams cad shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid ma yin/ stong
30a1('bum): pa nyid las gud na'ang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid med/ lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid las gud na'ang / stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang
30a2('bum): lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang / rnam pa thams cad
30a3('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid med/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa
30a4('bum): nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/
30a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ thabs mkhas par shes par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
30a6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i rgal pa yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems
30a7('bum): dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod kyang / spyod do zhes bya bar mi dmigs so// mi spyod do zhes bya bar mi dmigs so// spyod kyang spyod la mi
30b1('bum): spyod kyang mi spyod ces bya bar mi dmigs so// spyod pa yang ma yin mi spyod pa yang ma yin zhes bya bar mi dmigs so// sha ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ji'i
30b2('bum): phyir na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ spyod ces bya bar yang mi dmigs/ mi spyod ces bya bar yang mi
30b3('bum): dmigs/ spyod kyang spyod la mi spyod kyang mi spyod ces bya bar yang mi dmigs/ spyod pa yang ma yin mi spyod pa yang ma yin zhes bya bar yang mi dmigs pa yin/ rab 'byor kyis
30b4('bum): smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin mi dmigs pa'i phyir te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/
30b5('bum): dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin te/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spong ba'i tshe/
30b6('bum): spyod do zhes bya bar yang mi dmigs so// mi spyod do// zhes bya bar yang mi dmigs so// spyod kyang spyod la mi spyod kyang mi spyod do zhes bya bar yang mi dmigs so// spyod pa
30b7('bum): yang ma yin mi spong pa yang ma yin no zhes bya bar yang mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin du khong du chud de ma blangs pa'i phyir ro/
31a1('bum): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spong ba'i tshe/ sems zhum pa med cing yongs su zhum pa med de/
31a2('bum): mi 'jigs mi sdang skrag par mi 'gyur na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nye bar gyur par shes par
31a3('bum): bya'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa de yang chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
