73b5('bum): nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir yod pa ma yin no// sha ra dwa ti'i bu so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi nang stong /
73b6('bum): pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa
73b7('bum): nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang
73b8('bum): dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong bzhid dang/
74a1('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong
74a2('bum): pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir yod pa ma yin no// sha ra dwa ti'i bu snying rje chen po nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang /
74a3('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha'
74a4('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi
74a5('bum): mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa spong ba nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir yod pa ma yin
74a6('bum): no// sha ra dwa ti'i bu sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / byi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid
74a7('bum): dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /
74b1('bum): dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong
74b2('bum): pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir yod pa ma yin no// de la byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams med pa la mngon par zhen pas sred pa la
74b3('bum): mngon par zhen te/ de dag gis med pa yongs su brtags pas/ med pa la mngon par zhen cing 'di lta ste/ chad pa dang rtag pa'i mtha' la chags pas/ de dag mi shes mi mthong /
74b4('bum): gang med pa'i chos de dag yongs su brtags nas/ ming dang gzugs la mngon par zhen pa de dag/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par zhen to// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
74b5('bum): pa la mngon par zhen to// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par zhen to// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par zhen to// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon
74b6('bum): par zhen to// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par zhen to// nang stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen to// phyi stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen to// phyi nang stong pa nyid la mngon par
74b7('bum): zhen to// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen to// chen po stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen to// don dam pa stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen to// 'dus byas stong pa nyid la
75a1('bum): mngon par zhen to// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen to// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen to// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong/
75a2('bum): pa nyid la mngon par zhen to// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen to// rang bzhin stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen to// chos thams cad stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen to// rang gi
75a3('bum): mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen to// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen to// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen to// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen
75a4('bum): to// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen to// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la mngon par zhen to// yang dag par spong ba rnams la mngon par zhen to// rdzu 'phrul
75a5('bum): gyi rkang pa rnams la mngon par zhen to// dbang po rnams la mngon par zhen to// stobs rnams la mngon par zhen to// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la mngon par zhen to// 'phags
75a6('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la mngon par zhen to// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la mngon par zhen to// bsam gtan rnams la mngon par zhen to// tshad med pa rnams la mngon
75a7('bum): par zhen to// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mngon par zhen to// rnam par thar pa rnams la mngon par zhen to// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
75b1('bum): dgul mngon par zhen to// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med dang / smon pa med pa la mngon par zhen to// mngon par shes pa rnams la mngon par zhen to//
75b2('bum): ting nge 'dzin rnams la mngon par zhen to// gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mngon par zhen to// snying rje chen po la mngon par zhen to// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la mngon par
75b3('bum): zhen to// mi 'jigs pa rnams la mngon par zhen to// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la mngon par zhen to// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la mngon par zhen to//
75b4('bum): de dag de ltar mngon par zhen pas/ yod pa ma yin pa'i chos rnams la yongs su rtog ste/ de dag mi shes mi mthong ngo // ci mi shes mi mthong zhe na/ gzugs mi shes mi mthong
75b5('bum): ngo / tshor ba mi shes mi mthong ngo // 'du shes mi shes mi mthong ngo // 'du byed mi shes mi mthong ngo // rnam par shes pa mi shes mi mthong ngo // mig mi shes mi mthong ngo //
75b6('bum): rna ba mi shes mi mthong ngo // sna mi shes mi mthong ngo // lce mi shes mi thong ngo // lus mi shes mi mthong ngo // yid mi shes mi mthong ngo // gzugs mi shes mi mthong ngo //
75b7('bum): sgra mi shes mi mthong ngo // dri mi shes mi mthong ngo // ro mi shes mi mthong ngo // reg mi shes mi mthong ngo // chos mi shes mi mthong ngo // mig gi rnam par shes pa mi shes
76a1('bum): mi mthong ngo // rna ba'i rnam par shes pa mi shes mi mthong ngo // sna'i rnam par shes pa mi shes mi mthong ngo // lce'i rnam par shes pa mi shes mthong ngo //
76a2('bum): lus kyi rnam par shes pa mi shes mi mthong ngo // yid kyi rnam par shes pa mi shes mi mthong ngo // mig gi 'dus te reg pa mi shes mi mthong ngo // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa mi shes mi
76a3('bum): mthong ngo // sna'i 'dus te reg pa mi shes mi mthong ngo // lce'i 'dus te reg pa mi shes mi mthong ngo // lus kyi 'dus te reg pa mi shes mthong ngo // yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mi
76a4('bum): shes mi mthong ngo // mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi shes mi mthong ngo // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi shes mi mthong ngo // sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i
76a5('bum): rkyen gyis tshor ba mi shes mi mthong ngo // lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi shes mi mthong ngo // lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi shes mi mthong ngo //
76a6('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi shes mi mthong ngo // sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi shes mi mthong ngo // tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi shes mi mthong ngo // bzod
76a7('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi shes mi mthong ngo // brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi shes mi thong ngo // bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi shes mi mthong ngo // shes rab
76b1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi shes mi mthong ngo // nang stong pa nyid mi shes mi mthong ngo // phyi stong pa nyid mi shes mi mthong ngo // phyi nang stong pa nyid mi shes mi mthong ngo // stong pa nyid
76b2('bum): stong pa nyid mi shes mi mthong ngo // chen po stong pa nyid mi shes mi mthong ngo // don dam pa stong pa nyid mi shes mi mthong ngo // 'dus pas stong pa nyid mi shes mi mthong ngo // 'dus
76b3('bum): ma byas stong pa nyid mi shes mi mthong ngo // mtha' las 'das pastong pa nyid mi shes mi mthong ngo // thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong po nyid mi shes mi mthong ngo // dor ba med pa nga /
76b4('bum): pa nyid mi shes mi mthong ngo // rang bzhin stong pa nyid mi shes mi mthong ngo // chos thams cad stong pa nyid mi shes mi mthong ngo // rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mi shes mi mthong
76b5('bum): ngo/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mi shes mi mthong ngo // dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mi shes mi mthong ngo // ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi shes mi mthong ngo // dngos po med pa'i don
76b6('bum): nyid stong pa nyid mi shes mi mthong ngo // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi mi shes mi mthong ngo // yang dag par spong ba bzhi mi shes mi mthong ngo // rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi
76b7('bum): mi shes mi mthong ngo // dbang po lnga mi shes mi mthong ngo // stobs lnga mi shes mi mthong ngo // byang chub kyi yan lag bdun mi shes mi mthong ngo // 'phags pa'i lam yan lag
78a1('bum): brgyad pa mi shes mi mthong ngo // 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mi shes mi mthong ngo // bsam gtan rnams mi shes mi mthong ngo // tshad med pa/
78a2('bum): rnams mi shes mi mthong ngo // gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi mi shes mi mthong ngo // rnam par thar pa brgyad mi shes mi mthong ngo // mthar gyis gnas pa'i
78a3('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa dgu mi shes mi mthong ngo // stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa mi shes mi mthong ngo // mngon par shes pa rnams mi shes mi mthong ngo //
78a4('bum): ting nge 'dzin rnams mi shes mi mthong ngo // gzungs kyi sgo rnam mi shes mi mthong ngo // snying rje chen po mi shes mi mthong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu mi shes
78a5('bum): mi mthong ngo // mi 'jigs pa bzhi mi shes mi mthong ngo // so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi mi shes mi mthong ngo // sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams mi shes mi mthong
78a6('bum): ngo / de ltar de dag ni byis pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'dong ba ste/ de dag 'byung ba ma yin no// gang nas 'byung ba ma yin zhe na/ 'dod pa'i khams nas 'byung ba ma yin no//
78a7('bum): gzugs kyi khams nas 'byung ba ma yin no// gzugs med pa'i khams nas 'brang ba ma yin no// nyan thos kyis nas 'byung ba ma yin no// rang sangs rgyas kyis nas
78b1('bum): 'byung ba ma yin no// de dag ni yid mi ches pa ste/ ji ltar yid mi ches zhe na/ gzugs gzugs kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// tshor ba tshor bas stong zhes bya bar/
78b2('bum): yid mi ches so// 'du shes 'du shes kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// 'du byed 'du byed kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// rnam par shes pa rnam par shes
78b3('bum): pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// mig mig gis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// rnaM ba rna bas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// sna snas skyong zhes bya bar yid
78b4('bum): mi ches so// lce lces stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// lus lus kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// yid yid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so//
78b5('bum): gzugs gzugs kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// sgra sgras stong zhes bya bar yid mi chas so// dri dris stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// re ros stos zhes bya
78b6('bum): bar yid mi ches so// rag reg gos stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// chos chos kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// mig gi rnam par shes pa mig gi rnam par shes pas
78b7('bum): stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa rna ba'i rnam par shes pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// sna'i rnam par shes pa sna'i rnam par shes pas stong zhes
79a1('bum): bya bar yi mi ches so// lce'i rnam par shes pa lce'i rnam par shes pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// lus kyi rnam par shes pa zhus byirnam par
79a2('bum): shes pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// yid kyi rnam par shes pa yid kyi rnam par shes pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// mig gi 'dus te reg pa mig gi 'dus te reg pa sa stong zhes
79a3('bum): bya bar yid mi ches so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa rna ba'i 'dus te reg pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa sna'i 'dus te reg pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so//
79a4('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa lce'i 'dus te reg pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa lus kyi 'dus te reg pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// yid kyi 'dus
79a5('bum): te reg pa yid kyi 'dus te reg pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// mig gi 'dus re reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong zhes bya bar yid
79a6('bum): michis so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen byis chom
79a7('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong zhes bya bar yid mi
79b1('bum): ces so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas spong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshong dang/
79b2('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas spong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// tshul khrims
79b3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong zhes bya bar yod mi ches so// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas spong zhes bya bar yid mi
79b4('bum): ches so// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ bsam gtan gyis
79b5('bum): rol tu phyin pas stong zhes bya bar yin mi ches so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// nang stong pa nyid nang stong
79b6('bum): nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// phyi stong pa nyid phyi slong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// phyi nang stong pa nyid byinang stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi che
79b7('bum): so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi chas so// chen po stong pa nyid chen po stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// don dam/
80a1('bum): pa stong nyid don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so//
80a2('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi
80a3('bum): ches so// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyis/
80a4('bum): stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis/ stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid chos thams cad stong pa
80a5('bum): nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid//
80a6('bum): mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyis/ stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// ngo bo nyid
80a7('bum): stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid
80b1('bum): mi ches so// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// yang dag par spong ba bzhi yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis
80b2('bum): stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// dbang po lnga dbang po rnams kyis stong zhes bya bar
80b3('bum): yid mi chos so// stobs lnga stobs rnams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// byang chub kyi yan lag bdun/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi
80b4('bum): ches so// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi chos so// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 'phags
80b5('bum): pa'i bden pa rnams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// bsam gtan rnams bsam gtan rnams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// tshad med rnams tshad med pa rnams kyis
80b6('bum): stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so//
80b7('bum): par thar pa brgyad/ rnam par thar pa brgyad kyis/ stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
81a1('bum): pa dgus stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa rnam par thar pa'i/
81a2('bum): sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa/ smon pa med pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// mngon par shes pa rnams mngon par shes pa rnams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi
81a3('bum): ches so// ting nge 'dzin rnams ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// gzungs kyi sgo rnams gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// de
81a4('bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// mi 'jigs pa bzhi mi 'jigs pa bzhis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so//
81a5('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// snying rje chen po snying rje chen pos stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// sa
81a6('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i
81a7('bum): 'bras bus stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bus stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// phyir mi
81b1('bum): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bus stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// dgra bcom pa nyid dgra bcom pa nyid kyis/ stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so//
81b2('bum): rang byang chub rang byang chub kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis/ stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// rnam sa
81b3('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// de dag ni gnas pa ma yin pa ste/ ji ltar gnas pa ma yin zhe na sbyin
81b4('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa ma yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa ma yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa ma yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pharal
81b5('bum): tu byin pa la gnas pa ma yin/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa ma yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma
81b6('bum): yin/ phyi stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin/ chen po stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin/
81b7('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid la gnas pa la ma yin/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa
82a1('bum): la gnas pa ma yin/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin/ rang bzhin
82a2('bum): stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la gnas
82a3('bum): pa ma yin/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin/ phyir
82a4('bum): mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas pa ma yin/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la gnas pa ma yin/ yang dag par spong ba rnams la gnas pa ma yin/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams
82a5('bum): la gnas pa ma yin/ dbang po rnams la gnas pa ma yin/ stobs rnams la gnas pa ma yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la gnas pa ma yin/ 'phags pa'i lam yan
82a6('bum): lag brgyad pa la gnas pa ma yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la gnas pa ma yin/ bsam gtan rnams la gnas pa ma yin/ tshad med pa rnams la gnas pa ma yin/
82a7('bum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gnas pa ma yin/ rnam par thar pa brgyad la gnas pa ma yin/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la gnas pa
82b1('bum): ma yin/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa la gnas pa ma yin/ mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas pa ma yin/ ting nge 'dzin
82b2('bum): rnams la gnas pa me yin/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams la gnas pa ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la gnas pa ma yin/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi la gnas pa ma yin/
82b3('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la gnas pa ma yin/ byams pa chen po la gnas pa ma yin/ snying rje chen po la gnas pa ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam
82b4('bum): la gnas pa ma yin no// de dag ni mngon par zhen pa yin te/ ji ltar mngon par zhen pa yin zhe na/ gzugs la mngon par zhen pa yin/ tshor ba la mngon par/
82b5('bum): zhen pa yin/ 'du shes la mngon par zhen pa yin/ 'du byed la mngon par zhen pa yin/ rnam par shes pa la mngon par zhen pa yin/ mig la mngon par zhen
82b6('bum): pa yin/ rna ba la mngon par zhen pa yin/ sna la mngon par zhen pa yin/ lce la mngon par zhen pa yin/ lus la mngon par zhen pa yin/ yid la mngon
82b7('bum): par zhen pa yin/ gzugs la mngon par zhen pa yin/ sgra la mngon par zhen pa yin/ dri la mngon par zhen pa yin/ ro la mngon par zhen pa yin/ reg la
83a1('bum): mngon par zhen pa yin/ chos la mngon par zhen pa yin/ mig gi khams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ gzugs kyi khams la mngon par
83a2('bum): zhen pa yin/ mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ rna ba'i khams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ sgra'i khams la mngon par zhen pa yin/
83a3('bum): rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ sna'i khams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ dri'i khams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ sna'i rnam par
83a4('bum): shes pa'i khams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ lce'i khams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ ro'i khams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'i
83a5('bum): khams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ lus kyi khams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ reg bya'i khams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i
83a6('bum): khams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ yid kyi khams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ chos kyi khams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams la mngon par
83a7('bum): zhen pa yin/ 'dod chags la mngon par zhen pa yin/ zhe sdang la mngon par zhen pa yin/ gti mug la mngon par zhen pa yin/ lta ba'i rnam pa la mngon par zhen pa yin/
83b1('bum): ma za bar shes pa la mngon par zhen pa yin/ ming dang gzugs la mngon pa zhen pa yin/ skye mched drug la mngon par zhen pa yin//
83b2('bum): ma rig pa la mngon par zhen pa yin/ 'du byed la mngon par zhen pa yin/ reg pa la mngon par zhen pa yin/ tshor ba la mngon par zhen pa yin/ sred pa la mngon par zhen pa yin/
83b3('bum): len pa la mngon par zhen pa yin/ srid pa la mngon par zhen pa yin/ skye ba la mngon par zhen pa yin/ rga shil mngon par zhen pa yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mtshan
83b4('bum): par zhen pa yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par zhen pa yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par zhen pa yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
83b5('bum): mngon par zhen pa yin/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par zhen pa yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par zhen pa yin/ nang stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen
83b6('bum): pa yin/ phyi stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin/ chen po stong pa nyid
83b7('bum): la mngon par zhen pa yin/ don dam pa stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa
83b8('bum): yin/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin/
84a1('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par
84a2('bum): zhen pa yin/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin/
84a3('bum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ yang dag par spong ba rnams la rna mngon par zhen pa yin//
84a4('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ dbang po rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ stobs rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la mngon
84a5('bum): par zhen pa yin/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la mngon par zhen pa yin// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ bsam gtan rnams la
84a6('bum): mngon par zhen pa yin/ tshad med pa rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ rnam par thar pa brgyad
84a7('bum): la mngon par zhen pa yin/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la mngon par zhen pa yini/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa
84b1('bum): med pa la mngon par zhen pa yin/ mngon par shes pa rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ ting nge 'dzin rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mngon par zhen pa
84b2('bum): yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la mngon par zhen pa yin/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi la mngon par zhen pa yin/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la mngon par zhen pa
84b3('bum): yin/ byams pa chen po la mngon par zhen pa yin/ snying rje chen po la mngon par zhen pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la mngon par zhen pa yin/ rgyun
84b4('bum): tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la mngon par zhen pa yin/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la mngon par zhen pa yin/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la mngon par zhen pa yin/ dgra
84b5('bum): bcom pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin/ rang byang chub la mngon par zhen pa yin/ lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
84b6('bum): nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la mngon par zhen pa yin te/ de'i phyir na byis pa zhes bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan
84b7('bum): 'das de ltar slob pa'i/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi slob cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi 'byung ba lags
85a1('bum): sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra da ti'i bu de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol
85a2('bum): tu phyin pa la mi slob pa yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi 'byung ba yin/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/
85a3('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi slob pa lags rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi 'byung ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub
85a4('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// thabs mi mkhas pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la/ brtags shing mngon par zhe na/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la/ brtags
85a5('bum): shing mngon par zhen/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la/ brtag shing mngon par zhen/ tshul khrims
85a6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la/ brtags shing mngon par zhen/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la/ brtags shing mngon par zhe na/ nang stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par
85a7('bum): zhe na/ bye stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ byo nang stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhe na/
85b1('bum): su grong pa rjid la brtag shing mngon pa shen/
85b2('bum): chen po stong nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ don dam pa stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhe na// mtha
85b3('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la brtags shing
85b4('bum): mngon par zhen/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la
85b5('bum): brtags shing mngon par zhen/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ ngo bo nyid stong pa
85b6('bum): nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la brtags shing mngon par
85b7('bum): zhen/ yang dag par spong ba rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ dbang po rnams la brtags shing mngon
85b8('bum): par zhe na/ stobs rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa
86a1('bum): la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ bsam gtan rnams la brtags shing mngon
86a2('bum): par zhen/ tshad med pa rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ rnam par thar pa brgyad
86a3('bum): la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la brtags shing mngon par zhe na/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med/
86a4('bum): pa dang smon pa med pa la brtags shing mngon par zhe na/ mngon par shes pa rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhen//
86a5('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la brtags shing mngon par zhe na/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi la brtags shing mngon par
86a6('bum): zhe na/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la btags shing mngon par zhen/ byams pa chen po la brtags shing mngon par zhe na/ snying rje chen po la brtags shing mngon par zhen/
86a7('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ thams cad shes pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ lam gyi rnams pa shes pa nyid la brtags
86b1('bum): shing mngon par zhen/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen pas/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnams grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
86b2('bum): de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi slob pa yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi 'byung ba yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta lags na/ byang chub
86b3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam pa gang gis slob par 'gyur ba lags/ ji ltar bslabs pas na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung
86b4('bum): ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ shes rab
86b5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de mi dmigs/ yang dag par rjes su mi mthong shing / sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slong na/
86b6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'byung ba yin no// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems sems dpa' chen po// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i/
86b7('bum): tshe/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa de/ mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi
87a1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems
87a2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shar
87a3('bum): da ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// sharab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i chulas gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung //
87a4('bum): shar dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su
87a5('bum): mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams
87a6('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // shar dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chug khrims kyi pha rol tu
87a7('bum): byin pa de mi migs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shar dwa ti'i bubyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rib kyi rol tu byon pa la de sar spong ni/
87b1('bum): mi dmigs pa'i tshum gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // shar dwa ti'i dbyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
87b2('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de mi dmigs shing / yang dag par rje su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
87b3('bum): po// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo //
87b4('bum): / bam po lnga pa'o// / sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ nang stong
87b5('bum): pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ nang stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing / yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/
87b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems
87b7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po// phyi stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ phyi stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing / yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shar dwa ti'i bu byang chub
88a1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad
88a2('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ phyi nang stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing
88a3('bum): yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul
88a4('bum): gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ stong pa
88a5('bum): nyid stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing / yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
88a6('bum): pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/
88a7('bum): chen po stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ chen po stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing / yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dadwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems
88b1('bum): dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i
88b2('bum): bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ don dam pa stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing / yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/
88b3('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen/
88b4('bum): pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// 'dus bya stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing /
88b5('bum): yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ro dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul
88b6('bum): gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'dus
88b7('bum): ma byas stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing / yang dag par rjes su me mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// she rab kyi pha rol tu/
89a1('bum): phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra da ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa'
89a2('bum): sems dpa' chen po// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs shing / yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/
89a3('bum): ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
89a4('bum): du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems sems dpa' chen po/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid de mi
89a5('bum): dmigs shing / yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// sha ra da ta' ba bang chab sems dpa' sems
89a6('bum): dpa' chan pa// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi domigs tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub
89a7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing / yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/
89b1('bum): sha ra dadwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
89b2('bum): pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing /
89b3('bum): yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs
89b4('bum): pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra da ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// chos thams cad stong pa nyid la stod/
89b5('bum): pa'i tshe/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing / yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// she
89b6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa'
89b7('bum): sems dpa' chen po// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing / yang dge bar rjes su mi mthong ste/
90a1('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// she rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i
90a2('bum): tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i
90a3('bum): tshe/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing / yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/
90a4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa'
90a5('bum): sems dpa' chen po// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing / yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shar
90a6('bum): da ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
90a7('bum): pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de mi dmig shing /
90b1('bum): yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs
90b2('bum): pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
90b3('bum): nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing / yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang
90b4('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
90b5('bum): 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa de dag mi dmig
90b6('bum): shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmi
90b7('bum): pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// yang dag par spong ba rnams la
91a1('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag par spong ba de dag mi dmigs shing / yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
91a2('bum): chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa'
91a3('bum): sems dpa' chen po// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa de dag mi dmigs shing / yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra da ti'i bu byang chub
91a4('bum): sems dpa' sems chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i
91a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// dbang po rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ dbang po de dag mi ngamags shing / yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shar dwa ti'i bu byang chub
91a6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // shar dwa
91a7('bum): ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// stobs rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ stongs de dag mi dmigs shing / yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bubyang /
91b1('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// she rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // shar da ti'i
91b2('bum): bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ byang chub kyi yan lag de dag mi dmigs shing / yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shar
91b3('bum): dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu byon pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo //
91b4('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'phags lham yan lag brgyad pa de dag mi dmigs shing / yang dag
91b5('bum): bar rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra da ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i chus gyis/ rnam pa mas
91b6('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha rang ti'i du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'phags pa'i bden pa de dag mi dmigs shis
91b7('bum): yang dag par rjes su mi mthong na/ shar da ti'i bubyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/
92a1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // shar da ti'i dubyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// bsam gtan rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/
92a2('bum): bsam gtan de dag mi dmigs shing / yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de
92a3('bum): ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ tshad med pa
92a4('bum): rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshad med pa de dag mi dmigs shing / yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi
92a5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/
92a6('bum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag mi dmigs shing / yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra
92a7('bum): dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
92b1('bum): 'byung ngo // sha ra dadwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// rnam par thar pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par thar pa de dag mi dmigs shing / yang dag
92b2('bum): par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/
92b3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// mthar gyi gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la spyod pa'i tshe/
92b4('bum): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu po de dag mi dmigs shing / yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen/
92b5('bum): po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa'
92b6('bum): sems dpa' chen po// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / ma
92b7('bum): ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa de dag mi dmigs shing / yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab
93a1('bum): sa sbyin pas des ba na/ mi pa rgya gyig/ rnam thamams cad sa byed pa cid du 'byung // da kya'i rgya
93a2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ mngon par shes pa de dag mi dmigs shing / yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa
93a3('bum): ti'i dbyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen go// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas de sar slob pa ni/ mi migs pa'i chus gyis/ rnam pasams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'phru
93a4('bum): // shar da ti'i dubyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ ting nge 'a ni rnams la spyod pa'i rje/ ting nge 'dzidi de dag mi dmigs shing / yang dag par rjes su mi
93a5('bum): mthong ste/ sha rang ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i nus gyis/ rnam pa thams cad
93a6('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra da ti'i 'byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzungs kyi sgo de dag mi dmigs shing / yang
93a7('bum): dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shar da ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
93b1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la spyod pa'i tshe/ de bzhin
93b2('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu po de dag mi dmigs shing / yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi
93b3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
93b4('bum): chen po// mi 'jigs pa bzhi la spyod pa'i tshe/ mi 'jigs bzhi po de dag mi dmigs shing / yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems/
93b5('bum): dadapa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // shar
93b6('bum): dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la spyod pa'i tshe/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi po de dag mi dmigs shing /
93b7('bum): yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i chus
94a1('bum): gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// snying rje chen po
94a2('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ snying rje chen po de mi dmigs shing / yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi
94a3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/
94a4('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa de dag mi dmigs shing / yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i
94a5('bum): bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
94a6('bum): nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// thams cad shes pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ thams cad shes pa nyid de mi dmig shig/
94a7('bum): yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs
94b1('bum): pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyod
94b2('bum): pa'i tshe/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid de mi dmigs shing / yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes
94b3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob ba ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa'
94b4('bum): sems dpa' chen po// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de mi dmigs shing / yang dag par rjes su mi mthog
94b5('bum): ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slong ba ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad
94b6('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / de ltar shes rab
94b7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'i slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // gsol po/ bcom ldan 'das gang mi dmigs
95a1('bum): pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs
95a2('bum): pa'i tshul dang / phyi stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / chen
95a3('bum): po stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 'dus ma byas stong
95a4('bum): pa nyid/ mi migs pa'i tshul dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa spong ba nyid/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul
95a5('bum): dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid/ mi dmigs
95a6('bum): ba'i tshul dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid/ mi dmigs pa'i nul dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid/
95a7('bum): mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
95b1('bum): pa nyid du 'byung bar shes par bya'o// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/
95b2('bum): le'u drug pa'o// / de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das la
95b3('bum): la zhig 'di skad du 'dre zhing / ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam
95b4('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchin/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di
95b5('bum): skad du 'dri zhing / ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams
95b6('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid 'thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchin/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi// bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di ska
95b7('bum): du 'dri zhing / ji sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams
96a1('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid 'thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan

96a4('bum): 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ji sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa
96a5('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad
96a6('bum): du 'dri zhing / ji sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad
96a7('bum): mkhyen pa nyid 'thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchin/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing /
96b1('bum): ji sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di nang stong pa nyid la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'thob par 'gyur
96b2('bum): ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ji sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di phyi

96b4('bum): bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ji sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di phyi nang stong pa nyid la

96b7('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan

97a7('bum): la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchin/ bcom ldan 'das de

97b2('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan
97b3('bum): par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ji sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung
97b4('bum): bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la

97b6('bum): pa nyid 'thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ji sgyu ma'i skyes
97b7('bum): bu 'di rang bzhin stong pa nyid la bsrabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchin/

98b7('bum): ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das ma la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ji sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di yang dag par spong ba rnams la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad

99a7('bum): 'thob par 'gyur me zhes mchin/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing / drim+bu ma'i
99b1('bum): skyes bu 'di byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'thob par 'gyur

99b6('bum): ram zhes mchin/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ji sgra ma'i skyes bu'ang

100a3('bum): zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ji sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di gzug
100a4('bum): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'thob par
100a5('bum): 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ji sgyu ma'i skyes
100a6('bum): bu 'di rnam par thar pa brgyad la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'thob par 'gyur ram
100a7('bum): zhes mchin/ bcom ldan 'das de skang du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ji sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di
100b1('bum): mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la bsrabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
100b2('bum): nyid 'thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing /
100b3('bum): ji sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung
100b4('bum): par 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/
100b5('bum): bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ji sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di mngon par shes pa rnams la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
100b6('bum): 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi//
100b7('bum): bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di ting nge 'dzin rnams la bsrabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar
101a1('bum): 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji
101a2('bum): skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ji sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di gzungs kyi sgo rnams la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad
101a3('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du
101a4('bum): bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ji sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la bslabs shing / rnam pa
101a5('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchin/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad
101a6('bum): du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ji sgyu ma'i skyes 'di mi 'jigs pa rnams la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
101a7('bum): pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchin/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par
101b1('bum): bgyi bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
101b2('bum): pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'thob par 'gyur zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par
101b3('bum): bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ji sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di snying rje chen po la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung
101b4('bum): bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchin/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/
101b5('bum): bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ji sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la bslangs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
101b6('bum): pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'thobang par 'gyur ram zhes mchin/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bskun
101b7('bum): par bgyi de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor de lta bas na de
102a1('bum): khyod nyid la dris/ khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de ltar lung ston cing / rab 'byor de ji snyams du sems/ gzugs kyang
102a2('bum): gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/

108a5('bum): stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das

108a7('bum): snga ma 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid
108b1('bum): kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji
108b2('bum): snyam du sems/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das
108b3('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das

108b7('bum): nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab

109b1('bum): snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang

109b7('bum): med pa rnams kyang gzhanas/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das des ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/

111a6('bum): kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang gzugs so// bcom ldan 'das tshor ba'ang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ tshor ba nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma
111a7('bum): nyid kyang tshor ba'o// bcom ldan 'das 'du shes kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ 'du shes nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang 'du shes so//
111b1('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'du byed kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ 'du byed nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang 'du byed do// bcom ldan 'das
111b2('bum): rnam par shes pa'ang gzhan lags/ sgyu ma 'ang gzhan ma lags te/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// bcom ldan 'das
111b3('bum): mig kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ mig nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang mig go// bcom ldan 'das rna ba'ang gzhan lags/ sgyu
111b4('bum): ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ rna ba nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rna ba'o// bcom ldan 'das sna yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/
111b5('bum): nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang sna'o// bcom ldan 'das lce yang gzhan ma lags/ snu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ lho nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang lce'o//

112a1('bum): gzhan ma lags te/ gzugs nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang gzugs so// bcom ldan 'das sgra yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma

112a3('bum): kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang dri'o// bcom ldan 'das ro yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ ro nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang ro'o//

112a5('bum): kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma legs te/ chos rnams nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu mi nyid kyang chos so// bcom ldan 'das mig gi rnam par shes pa
112a6('bum): 'ang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ mig gi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa'o// bcom ldan
112a7('bum): 'das rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'ang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'o// /

112b2('bum): rnam par shes pa'o// bcom ldan 'das lce'i rnam par shes pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ lce'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/
112b3('bum): sgyu ma nyid kyang lce'i rnam par shes pa'o// bcom ldan 'das lus kyi rnam par shes pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ lus kyi rnam par
112b4('bum): shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'o// bcom ldan 'das yid kyi rnam par shes pa'ang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma

112b6('bum): lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'o// bcom ldan 'das rna
112b7('bum): 'dus te reg pa'ang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ rna bo'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'o//

113a5('bum): gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o// bcom ldan
113a6('bum): 'das mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan me lags te/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang
113a7('bum): sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// bcom ldan 'das rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang gzhan ma lags//
113b1('bum): sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// bcom ldan
113b2('bum): 'das sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yid ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma

113b5('bum): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan mi lags te/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang
113b6('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// bcom ldan 'das yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma
113b7('bum): lags te/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu mo nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// bcom ldan 'das
114a1('bum): sa'i khams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ sa'i khams nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang sa'i kham so//

114a3('bum): bcom ldan 'das me'i khams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ me'i khams nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang me'i khams so//

114a5('bum): ldan 'das nam mkha'i khams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ nam mkha'i khams nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang nam mkha'i khams so//
114a6('bum): bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa'i kham kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyum yang gzhan ma lags te/ rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'i kham so//
114a7('bum): bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa yang ma lags/ snum yang gzhan ma lags te/ ma rig pa nyid kyang sgyus/ sgyu ma nyid kyangam rig pa'o// bcom ldan
114b1('bum): 'das 'du byed kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ 'du byed nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang 'du byed do// bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes
