114b3('bum): dang gzugs kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ ming dang gzugs nyid kyang skye ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang ming dang gzugs so// bcom ldan 'das
114b4('bum): skye mched drug kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ skye mched drug nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang skye mched drug go// bcom ldan 'das
114b5('bum): reg pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ reg pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang reg pa'o// bcom ldan 'das tshor ba
114b6('bum): yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ tshor ba nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang tshor ba'o// bcom ldan 'das sred pa yang gzhan ma
114b7('bum): lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhin ma lags te/ sred pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang sred pa'o// bcom ldan 'das len pa yang gzhan ma lags//
115a1('bum): sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ len pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang len pa'o// bcom ldan 'das srid pa yang gzhan
115a2('bum): ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ srid pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang srid pa'o// bcom ldan 'das skye ba yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu
115a3('bum): ma yang gzhan ma legs te/ skye ba nyid kyang sgyum/ sgyu ma nyid kyang skye ba'o// bcom ldan 'das na shi yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/
115a4('bum): rga shi nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rga shi'o// bcom ldan 'das sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ sbyin
115a5('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das tshul khrims pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan ma lags/
115a6('bum): sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang sgyu sa/ sgyu ma nyid kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das
115a7('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma legs te/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang bzod
115b1('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ brtson 'grus
115b2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan ma
115b3('bum): lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang bsam gtan gyi rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom na
115b4('bum): 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang skye ma/ sgyu ma nyid
115b5('bum): kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das nang stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma legs te/ nang stong pa nyid kyang
115b6('bum): sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang nang stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das phyi stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ phyi stong pa nyid kyang
115b7('bum): sgyu sa/ sgyu pa nyid kyang byi stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ phyi nang stong
116a1('bum): pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/
116a2('bum): sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das chen po stong pa nyid
116a3('bum): kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ chen po stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang chen po stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das
116a4('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang don dam pa stong pa
116a5('bum): nyid do// bcom ldan 'das 'dus pas stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te de/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/
116a6('bum): sgyu ma nyid kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ 'dus
116a7('bum): ma byas stong pa nyid kyang sgyu sa/ sgyu ma nyid kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags//
116b1('bum): sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das thog
116b2('bum): ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid
116b3('bum): kyang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhin ma lags te/
116b4('bum): dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/
116b5('bum): sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad
116b6('bum): stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid chos thams cad stong pa nyid
116b7('bum): do// bcom ldan 'das rang gi ma'i tshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rang gi mtshan nyid
117a1('bum): stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das mi dmigs pa
117a2('bum): stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang mi dmigs pa
117a3('bum): stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid
117a4('bum): kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/
117a5('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/
117a6('bum): sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ dbo nyid stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das dran pa nye ba
117a7('bum): dngos po med
117a8('bum): gzhag pa rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa
117b1('bum): rnams so// bcom ldan 'das yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ snu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ yang dag par spong ba nyid kyang sgyu ma/
117b2('bum): ma nyid kyang yang dag par spong ba rnams so// bcom ldan 'das rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rdzu 'phrul
117b3('bum): rkang pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das dbang po rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags
117b4('bum): te/ dbang po nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang dbang po rnams so// bcom ldan 'das stobs rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/
117b5('bum): stobs nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang stobs rnams so// bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyum yang gzhan ma lags te/
117b6('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so// bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yang gzhan
117b7('bum): mi lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o//
118a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ 'phags pa'i bden pa
118a2('bum): nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das bsam gtan rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lag
118a3('bum): te/ bsam gtan nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang bsam gtan rnams so// bcom ldan 'das tshad med pa rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma
118a4('bum): yang gzhan ma lags te/ tshad med pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang tshad med pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
118a5('bum): rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang gzugs med pa'i
118a6('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das rnam par bar pa brgyad kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rnam par thar pa nyid kyang
118a7('bum): snu ba/ sbru ma nyid kyang rnam par bar pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das mthar gyis gnas pa'i goms par 'jug pa dgu yang gzhan ma lags/ sbrus
118b1('bum): yang gzhan ma lags te/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so//
118b2('bum): ldan 'das rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rnam par
118b3('bum): thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa'o//
118b4('bum): bcom ldan 'das mngon par shes pa rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ mngon par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang
118b5('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang sgyu ma
118b6('bum): sgyu ma nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams so// bcom ldan 'das gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ gzungs kyi sgo nyid
118b7('bum): kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma/
119a1('bum): lags te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so//
119a2('bum): bcom ldan 'das mi 'jigs pa rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ mi 'jigs pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang mi
119a3('bum): 'jigs pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ so so yang dag
119a4('bum): par rig pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das snying rje chen po yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang
119a5('bum): gzhan ma lags te/ snying rje chen po nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang snying rje chen po'o// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang
119a6('bum): gzhan ma lags/ sgyu sa yang gzhan ma lags te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
119a7('bum): rnams so// bcom ldan 'das rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma legs te/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu
119b1('bum): nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o// bcom ldan 'das lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang
119b2('bum): gzhan ma lags te/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o// bcom ldan 'das phyir
119b3('bum): mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang phyir mi
119b4('bum): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o// bcom ldan 'das dgra bcom pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/
119b5('bum): sgyu ma nyid kyang dgra bcom pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rang byang chub kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rang byang chub nyid kyang sgyu ma/
119b6('bum): sgyu ma nyid kyang rang byang chub bo// bcom ldan 'das las gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang gzhan ma legs/ sbrum yang gzhan ma lags te/ lam gyi rnam pa shes
119b7('bum): banyid kyang gyub/ rdzu ma nyid kyang las kyi rnam pashes pa nyid de// bcom ldan 'das rnam pa thams cad mi khyed pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgrus pa
120a1('bum): gzhan ma lags te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// bcom
120a2('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma la skye ba'am 'gag pa yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis
120a3('bum): so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsol pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma la kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am rnam par byang ba yod dam/ gsol ba
120a4('bum): bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ gang la skye ba med cing 'gag pa med pa dang /
120a5('bum): kun nas nyon mongs pa med cing rnam par byang ba med pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/
120a6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram/ gsom pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab
120a7('bum): 'byor de rje mam du sems/ nye bar ldan pa'i phung po lnga po de dag la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya bar 'dushes pa dang / brda' dang / gdags pa
120b1('bum): dang / ba snyad du bya ba yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du
120b2('bum): sems/ 'du shes dang brda' dang / gdags pa dang / tha snyad tsam gyis nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po skye ba 'am/ 'gag pa'am/ kun nas nyon mongs
120b3('bum): pa 'am/ rnam par byang bar dmigs par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab
120b4('bum): 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ gang la 'du shes med cing brda' med pa dang / gdags pa med pa dang tha snyad med pa dang / ming med pa dang ming du gdags pa med
120b5('bum): pa dang / lus med pa dang / lus kyi las med pa dang / ngag med pa dang / ngag gi las med pa dang / yid med pa dang / yid kyi las med pa dang / skye ba
120b6('bum): med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing rnam pa thams
120b7('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro//
121a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
121a2('bum): pa la bslabs shing mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro// gsol pa/
121a3('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis ci skad du gsungs pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu pA la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni/
121a4('bum): sgyu ma'i skyes bus bslabs pa de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bslab par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di lta
121a5('bum): ste/ phung po lnga po de nyid sgyu ma'i skyes bur rig par bya ba sha stag go// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ phung po lnga po
121a6('bum): 'di dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas bslangs shing rnam pa'ams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ras/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das den ma
121a7('bum): 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zho na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltang phung ba lnga po rnams ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin can te/ dngos po ma mchis
121b1('bum): pa'i rang bzhin de ni dmigs su ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ rmi lam lta bu'i phung po lnga po
121b2('bum): de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur rab/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur//
121b3('bum): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar rmi lam ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin can to/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni dmigs su mchis so//
121b4('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma lta bu'i phung po lnga po de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing rnam pa
121b5('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar
121b6('bum): pa'i rang na can te/ dngos pam mdzim pa'i rang bzhin tshigs sus pa ma // sa na nas sa pa'
121b7('bum): byor do nam du sas/ bla banasas bu'i phung po lnga pa dang ga shes rab gyi la rim tu phyin pas 'i srabs shing rnam pa thams cad mi byen pa nyid du 'byung
122a1('bum): 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar sgra brnyan
122a2('bum): ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin can te/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni dmigs su ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor
122a3('bum): de ji snyam du sems/ mig yor lta bu'i phung po lnga po de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/
122a4('bum): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar mig yor ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin te/ dngos
122a5('bum): po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni dmigs su ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ chu zla lta bu'i phung po
122a6('bum): lnga po de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi
122a7('bum): 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du na ni/ bcom ldan 'das doni 'di ltar chu bra ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin te/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni dmigs
122b1('bum): su ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sdig rngu lta bu'i phung po lnga po de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
122b2('bum): bslabs shing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan
122b3('bum): 'das de ni 'di ltar smig rgyu ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin te/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni dmigs su ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis
122b4('bum): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sprul pa lta bu'i phung po lnga po de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
122b5('bum): nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar sprul pa ni dngos
122b6('bum): po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin te/ dngos po mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni dmigs su ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//
122b7('bum): rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar gzugs ni rmi lam lta bu/ tshor ba ni rmims lta bu/ 'du shes ni rmi lam lta bu/ 'du byed ni rmi lam lta bu/ rnam par shes pa ni rdzi lam
123a1('bum): lta bu ste/ rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po drug go// de ni phung po lnga'o// de dag ni nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir
123a2('bum): mi dmigs so// phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// /
123a3('bum): chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// 'dus ma byas
123a4('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so//
123a5('bum): dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so//
123a6('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so//
123a7('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// rab 'byor gzugs ni sgyu ma lta bu/
123b1('bum): tshor ban sku mos bu/ 'dushes ni sgyus lAT/ 'du byed ni sgyus sa gra rnam par shes pa ni snrums bu ste/ rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang
123b2('bum): drug go// de ni phung po lnga'o// de dag ni nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmig sa/
123b3('bum): stong pa 'di stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// 'dus byas
123b4('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// thog
123b5('bum): ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so//
123b6('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so//
123b7('bum): dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmig so//
124a1('bum): rab 'byor gzugs ni sgra brnyan lta bu/ tshor ba ni sgra brnyan lta bu/ 'du shes ni sgra brnyan lta bu/ 'du byed ni sgra brnyan
124a2('bum): lta bu/ rnam par shes pa ni sgra brnyan lta bu ste/ rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po drug go// de ni phung po lnga'o// de dag ni nang stong pa nyid
124a3('bum): kyi phyir mi dmigs so// phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmig
124a4('bum): so// chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so//
124a5('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi
124a6('bum): phyir mi dmigs so// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid
124a7('bum): kyi phyir mi dmigs so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// dngos po med
124b1('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so//
124b2('bum): rab 'byor gzugs ni mig yor lta bu/ tshor ba ni mig yor lta bu/ 'du shes ni mig yor lta bu/ 'du byed ni mig yor lta bu/ rnam par shes pa ni mig yor buH/
124b3('bum): rnam pa breb pa yin pa de ni dbang po drug go// da ni phung po lnga'o// de dag ni nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// phyi nang
124b4('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// don dam

133b1('bum): de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes smon pa med pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs so//
133b2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed smon pa med pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams
133b3('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa smon pa med pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed do/ de mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di ni byang
133b4('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
133b5('bum): sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs mngon
133b6('bum): par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba mngon
133b7('bum): par du bya ba med pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes mngon
134a1('bum): par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
134a2('bum): la bya bas/ 'du byed mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
134a3('bum): la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
134a4('bum): dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/
134a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs dben pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/
134a6('bum): mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba dben pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa
134a7('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes dben pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
134b1('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed dben pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam
134b2('bum): par shes pa dben pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi phyi rol tu bal spyod
134b3('bum): ba'i thabs mkhas pa'o// / bam po bdun pa'o// / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' tshon po//
134b4('bum): de ltar rtogs pa de ji snyam du sems te/ sems can thams cad gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya
134b5('bum): bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// gzugs bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// gzugs zhi zhes bya bar de mi
134b6('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// gzugs stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// gzugs mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs
134b7('bum): pa'i nus gyis chos bstaran to// gzugs smon pa med ces bya bar nga mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba de mi dmag
135a1('bum): ba'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// gzugs dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// tshor ba mi rtag ces
135a2('bum): bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// tshor ba bdag med ces bya bar de mi
135a3('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// tshor ba zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// tshor ba stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
135a4('bum): chos ston to// tshor ba mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// tshor ba smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan
135a5('bum): to// tshor ba mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// tshor ba dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to//
135a6('bum): 'du shes mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// 'du shes sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to//
135a7('bum): shes bdag med ces bye bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// 'du shes ni zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// 'du shes so
135b1('bum): zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// 'du shes mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// 'du shes smon pa med ces bya bar
135b2('bum): de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// 'du shes mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// 'du shes dben zhes bya bar
135b3('bum): deste dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// 'du byed mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// 'du byed sdug bsngal zhes bya ba ngami
135b4('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// 'du byed bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// 'du byed ni zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
135b5('bum): tshul gyis chos bstan to// 'du byed stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// 'du byed mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
135b6('bum): bstan to// 'du byed smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// 'du byed mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
135b7('bum): chos bstan to// 'du byed dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// /
136a1('bum): rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
136a2('bum): gyis chos ston to// rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to//
136a3('bum): rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// rnam par shes pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// /
136a4('bum): rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
136a5('bum): bstan to snyam mo// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ de yod pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chas
136a6('bum): de mi 'jigs mi sdang skrag par mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
136a7('bum): thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ gzugs gang mi rtag pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// 1
136b1('bum): thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ gzugs gang sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do//
136b2('bum): thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ gzugs gang bdag med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan
136b3('bum): thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ gzugs gang zhi ba'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan
136b4('bum): thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ gzugs gang stong pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigasri tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos
136b5('bum): dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ gzugs gang mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan

138b1('bum): pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ 'du byed gang bdag med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmig
138b2('bum): pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ 'du byed gang zhi ba'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i
138b3('bum): tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ 'du byed gang stong pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs dri
138b4('bum): tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ 'du byed gang mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi
138b5('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ 'du byed gang smon pa med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi
138b6('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ 'du byed gang mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam par yid la
138b7('bum): byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ 'du byed gang dben pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de
139a1('bum): mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ rnam par shes pa gang mi rtag pa'i rnam par
139a2('bum): yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ rnam par shes pa gang sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par
139a3('bum): yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ rnam par shes pa gang bdag med pa'i rnam par
139a4('bum): yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ rnam par shes pa gang zhi ba'i rnam par yid la

139a6('bum): de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ rnam par shes pa gang smon pa med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa
139a7('bum): de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ rnam par shes pa gang mngon par 'du ba ba med pa'i rnam par yid
139b1('bum): la byed pa de mi dmigs tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ rnam par shes pa gang dben pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa
139b2('bum): de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyams pa med pa ste/ de yod pa
139b3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de mi 'jigs mi sdang skrag par mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
139b4('bum): byin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos de dag la mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang / zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa
139b5('bum): dang / mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rnam pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam pa dang / dben pa'i rnam par rtog par byed pa dang / bzod pa dang /
139b6('bum): mos pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ de yod pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'jigs mi sdang skrag
139b7('bum): par mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
140a1('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
140a2('bum): pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas//
140a3('bum): gzugs bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs zhi zhes bya bar
140a4('bum): de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
140a5('bum): rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab rtog go//
140a6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la ba bas/ gzugs smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs po'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad
140a7('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
140b1('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs dben bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/
140b2('bum): tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la ba bas/ tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de
140b3('bum): mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
140b4('bum): gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa
140b5('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyi rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
140b6('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba/
140b7('bum): tshor ba smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba mngon par 'du
141a1('bum): bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba dben
141a2('bum): zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs
141a3('bum): pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang mi ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab
141a4('bum): tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam
141a5('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
141a6('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la byangs/ 'du shes stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/
141a7('bum): 'du shes mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes
141b1('bum): smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes mngon par 'du bya ba
141b2('bum): med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes dben zhes bya bar mi
141b3('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab
141b4('bum): tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed sdug bsngal zhes bya bar ngo mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa
141b5('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtag go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
141b6('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/
141b7('bum): 'du byed stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed mtshan ma med
142a1('bum): ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed smon pa
142a2('bum): med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed mngon par 'du bya ba med
142a3('bum): ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed dben par bya bar de mi
142a4('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs
142a5('bum): pa'i tshul rlab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
142a6('bum): rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu
142a7('bum): rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes ba zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa
142b1('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad
142b2('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
142b3('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ldan
142b4('bum): pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtag go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
142b5('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// de ltar de de dag la rnam thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
142b6('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ mi gtong zhing brtson 'grus mi 'dor ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/
142b7('bum): de yod pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de mi 'jigs mi sdang skrag par mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
143a1('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs
143a2('bum): mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang mi dge ba'i chos de ma yin pa/ byang chub kyi
143a3('bum): bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi skabs mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa
143a4('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas
143a5('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
143a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs bdag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
143a7('bum): tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed
143b1('bum): pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/
143b2('bum): gzugs zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi
143b3('bum): bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams
143b4('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan
143b5('bum): ba'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
143b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs mtshan ma med ces bya bar
143b7('bum): de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su
144a1('bum): 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe//
144a2('bum): nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang
144a3('bum): rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya dang / mi dge ba de ma pa byang chub kyi bgeg su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems chen po
144a4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi
144a5('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go/
144a6('bum): mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la
144a7('bum): bya bas/ gzugs dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa
144b1('bum): byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams
144b2('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang /
144b3('bum): mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
144b4('bum): pa'i tshe/ ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang
144b5('bum): sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
144b6('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba bdag med ces bya bar de mi
144b7('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi
145a1('bum): 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
145a2('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba
145a3('bum): de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
145a4('bum): nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i
145a5('bum): yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgogs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
145a6('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing /
145a7('bum): nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'
145b1('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba smon pa med ces bya bar de mi
145b2('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go ma
145b3('bum): 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
145b4('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tsher rab mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang /
145b5('bum): mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
145b6('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos
145b7('bum): dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'
146a1('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas//
146a2('bum): 'du shes mi rtog ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang
146a3('bum): chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go ma 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam
146a4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang
146a5('bum): rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
146a6('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes bdag med ces
146a7('bum): bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgeg
146b1('bum): su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams
146b2('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i
146b3('bum): yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
146b4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
146b5('bum): tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi
146b6('bum): 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
146b7('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i
147a1('bum): yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi gro mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sem
147a2('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes smon pa med ces bya bar de mi

147a4('bum): pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya
147a5('bum): bas 'du shes mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi
147a6('bum): dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi 'gogs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
147a7('bum): pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byabs/ 'du shes dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang
147b1('bum): sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
147b2('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed mi rtag ces bya bar de ma
