147b4('bum): mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
147b5('bum): pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang /
147b6('bum): mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
147b7('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing /
148a1('bum): nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba
148a2('bum): gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
148a3('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / 'du byed zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid
148a4('bum): la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
148a5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
148a6('bum): tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi
148a7('bum): go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
148b1('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid
148b2('bum): la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
148b3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs
148b4('bum): pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go
148b5('bum): mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
148b6('bum): yid la bya bas/ 'du byed mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la
148b7('bum): bya dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
149a1('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed dben zhes bya bar
149a2('bum): de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba
149a3('bum): gzhan gyi gro mo 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
149a4('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya
149a5('bum): ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
149a6('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
149a7('bum): rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang /
149b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/
149b2('bum): rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin
149b3('bum): pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
149b4('bum): nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang
149b5('bum): sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'
149b6('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa
149b7('bum): stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi
150a1('bum): bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
150a2('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
150a3('bum): gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gri go mi 'byed
150a4('bum): pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam nom pa thams cad mkhyen pa dang ldan pa'i yid la
150a5('bum): bya bas/ rnam par shes pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang /
150a6('bum): mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
150a7('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs
150b1('bum): pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid pa bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi
150b2('bum): 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
150b3('bum): la bya bas/ 'gro rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge
150b4('bum): ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgeg su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan gyis pha rol tu phyin pa ste/
150b5('bum): de yod pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de mi 'jigs mi sdang skrag par mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
150b6('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam pa 'di ltar rab tu rtog ste/
150b7('bum): gzugs kyi stong pa nyid kyis gzugs stong pa yin gyi gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang gzugs so// tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis tshor ba stong
151a1('bum): pa ma yin gyi/ tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba'o// 'du shes kyi stong pa nyid kyis 'du shes stong pa me yin gyi/
151a2('bum): 'du shes nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang 'du shes nyid do// 'du byed kyi stong pa nyid kyis 'du byed stong pa ma yin gyi/ 'du byed nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//
151a3('bum): stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed do// rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa
151a4('bum): nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// mig gi stong pa nyid kyis mig stong pa ma yin gyi/ mig nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang mig go// rna ba'i stong pa nyid kyis
151a5('bum): rna ba stong pa ma yin gyi/ rna bani kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang rna ba'o// sna'i stong pa nyid kyis sna stong pa ma yin gyis/ sna nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//
151a6('bum): stong pa nyid kyang sna'o// lce'i stong pa nyid kyis lce stong pa ma yin gyi/ lce nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang lce'o// lus kyi stong pa nyid kyis lus stong pa
151a7('bum): ma yin gyi/ lus nyid stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang lus so// yid kyi stong pa nyid kyis yid stong pa yin gyi/ yid nyid stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang
151b1('bum): yid do// gzugs kyi stong pa nyid kyis gzugs stong pa ma yin gyi/ gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang gzugs so// sgra'i stong pa nyid kyis/
151b2('bum): sna stong pa ma yin gyi/ sna nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang sgra'o// dri'i stong pa nyid kyis dri stong pa ma yin gyi/ dri nyid stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang
151b3('bum): dri'o// ro'i stong pa nyid kyis ro stong pa ma yin gyi/ ro nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang ro'o// reg gi stong pa nyid kyis reg stong pa ma yin gyi/ reg nyid
151b4('bum): kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang reg go// chos kyi stong pa nyid kyis chos song ba ma yin gyi/ chos nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang chos so// mig gi/
151b5('bum): rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis mig gi rnam par shes pa stong ba ma yin gyi/ mig gi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang mig gi rnam par
151b6('bum): shes pa'o// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid
151b7('bum): kyang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'o// sna'i rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis sna'i rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ sna'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// /
152a1('bum): stong pa nyid kyang sna'i rnam par pa'o// lce'i rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis lce'i rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ lce'i rnam
152a2('bum): par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang lce'i rnam par shes pa'o// lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis lus kyis rnam par shes pa stong pa
152a3('bum): ma yin gyi/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'o// yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis
152a4('bum): yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o// mig gi 'dus
152a5('bum): te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis mig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa ma yin gyis/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg
152a6('bum): pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa ma yin gyi/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid
152a7('bum): kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid ni gyi/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//
152b1('bum): stong pa nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa
152b2('bum): nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ lus kyi 'dus te reg
152b3('bum): pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa ma yin gyi/
152b4('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis mig gi
152b5('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i
152b6('bum): rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid ma yin gyi/ rna ba'i 'dus
152b7('bum): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis
153a1('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin gyi/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang sna'i
153a2('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi/ lce'i 'dus
153a3('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong
153a4('bum): pa nyid kyis lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang
153a5('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi//
153a6('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// sa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid kyis
153a7('bum): sa'i khams kyi stong pa ma yin gyi/ sa'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang sa'i khams so// chu'i khams kyi stong pa nyid kyis chu'i khams stong /
153b1('bum): pa ma yin gyi/ chu'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang chu'i khams so// me'i khams kyi stong pa nyid kyis me'i khams stong pa ma yin gyi/ me'i
153b2('bum): khams kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang me'i khams so// rlung gyi khams kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ rlung gyi khams stong pa ma yin gyi/ rlung gyi khams nyid kyang
153b3('bum): stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang rlung gyi khams so// nam mkha'i khams kyi stong pa nyid kyis nam mkha'i stong pa ma yin gyi/ nam mkha'i khams nyid kyang stong
153b4('bum): pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang na mkha'i khams so// rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid kyis rnam par shes pa'i khams stong pa ma yin gyi/ rnam par shes
153b5('bum): pa'i khams nyid stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'i khams so// ma rig pa'i stong pa nyid kyis ma rig pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ ma rig pa nyid
153b6('bum): kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang ma rig pa'o// 'du byed kyi stong pa nyid kyis 'du byed stong pa ma yin gyi/ 'du byed nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang
153b7('bum): zhu byed do// rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis rnam par shes pa'i stong pa ma yin gyi/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang rnam par
154a1('bum): shes pa'o// ming dang gzugs kyi stong pa nyid kyis ming dang gzugs stong pa ma yin gyi/ ming dang gzugs ni kyang stong pa nyid do// stong
154a2('bum): pa nyid kyang ming dang gzugs so// skye mched drug gi stong pa nyid kyis skye mched drug stong pa ma yin gyi/ skye mched drug nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid
154a3('bum): kyang skye mched ga go/ reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis reg pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang reg pa'o// tshor ba'i stong
154a4('bum): pa nyid kyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi/ tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba'o// sred pa'i stong pa nyid kyis sred pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ sred
154a5('bum): pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang sred pa'o// len pa'i stong pa nyid kyis len pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ len pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid
154a6('bum): kyang len pa'o// srid pa'i stong pa nyid kyis srid pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ srid pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang srid pa'o// skye ba'i stong pa nyid kyis
154a7('bum): skye ba stong pa ma yin gyi/ skye ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang skye ba'o// rga shi'i stong pa nyid kyis rga shi stong pa ma yin gyi/ rga shi nyid kyang stong pa
154b1('bum): nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang rga shi'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid
154b2('bum): kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong
154b3('bum): pa ma yin gyi/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
154b4('bum): stong pa nyid kyis/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu
154b5('bum): byin pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ btson 'grus pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang
154b6('bum): stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin
154b7('bum): pastong pa ma yin gyi/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu smra'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu
155a1('bum): phyin pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa
155a2('bum): nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// nang stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis nang stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ nang stong pa nyid kyang stong pa
155a3('bum): nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang nang stong pa nyid do// phyi stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ phyi stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ phyi stong pa nyid kyang stong pa
155a4('bum): nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang stong pa phyi stong pa nyid do// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ phyi nang stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ byi nang stong pa nyid kyang stong pa
155a5('bum): nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang tshung
155a6('bum): nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong ba nyid do// chen po stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ chen po stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ chen po stong pa nyid kyang stong pa
155a7('bum): nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang chen po stong pa nyid do// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ don dam pa stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ don dam pa stong
155b1('bum): pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/
155b2('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ 'dus ma byas stong pa ma yin
155b3('bum): kyi 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis/
155b4('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do//
155b5('bum): thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa
155b6('bum): nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid do// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/
155b7('bum): dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ rang bzhin stong pa
156a1('bum): nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// chos thams cad stong
156a2('bum): pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang chos thams cad stong
156a3('bum): pa nyid do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//
156a4('bum): stong pa nyid kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa/ myi dmigs pa stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang
156a5('bum): stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid do// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/
156a6('bum): dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ ngo bo nyid skye/
156a7('bum): pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi
156b1('bum): stong pa nyid kyis/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang dngos
156b2('bum): po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ dran pa nye bar gzhag
156b3('bum): pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams so// yang dag par spong ba'i stong pa nyid kyis/ yang dag par spong ba rnams
156b4('bum): stong pa ma yin gyi/ yang dag par spong ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang yang dag par spong ba rnams so// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i stong pa nyid kyis rdzu 'phrul
156b5('bum): gyi rkang pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so// dbang po stong pa nyid kyis dbang po
156b6('bum): rnams stob ma yin gyi/ dbang po nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang dbang po rnams so// stobs kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ stobs rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/
156b7('bum): stobs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang stobs rnams so// byang chub kyi yan lag gi stong pa nyid kyis/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/
157a1('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
157a2('bum): pa'i stong pa nyid kyi/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang 'phags
157a3('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ 'phags pa'i bden pa nyid kyang stong pa
157a4('bum): nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams so// bsam gtan gyi stong pa nyid kyis/ bsam gtan rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ bsam gtan nyid kyang
157a5('bum): stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang bsam gtan rnams so// tshad med pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ tshad med pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ tshad med pa nyid kyang
157a6('bum): stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang tshad med pa rnams so// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug rnam
157a7('bum): stong pa ma yin gyi/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par pa rnams so// rnam par thar pa
157b1('bum): brgyad kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ rnam par thar pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ rnam par thar pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang rnam par thar pa rnams so// mthar
157b2('bum): kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i stong pa nyid kyis/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
157b3('bum): 'jug pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang /
157b4('bum): smon pa med pa'i stong pa nyid kyi/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
157b5('bum): mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa'o// mngon pa
157b6('bum): shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis mngon par shes pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ mngon par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang mngon par shes pa rnams so// /
157b7('bum): ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ ting nge 'dzin rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams so//
158a1('bum): gzungs kyi sgo'i stong pa nyid kyis/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ gzungs kyi sgo nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa
158a2('bum): nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi stong pa nyid kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
158a3('bum): stobs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so// mi 'jigs pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ mi 'jigs pa rnams stong pa ma yin
158a4('bum): gyi/ mi 'jigs pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang mi 'jigs pa rnams so// so so yang dag par rig pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ so so yang dag par rig
158a5('bum): pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ so so yang dag par rig pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so// snying rje chen po'i stong pa
158a6('bum): nyid kyis/ snying rje chen po'i stong pa ma yini gyi/ snying rje chen po nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang snying rje chen po'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i
158a7('bum): stong pa nyid kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang sangs
158b1('bum): rgyas kyi ma 'dres pa rnams so// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems
158b2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o// thabs mkhas pa de dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
158b3('bum): po ni/ bstan pa 'di thos na/ mi 'jigs mi sdang / skrag par mi 'gyur ro//
158b4('bum): bam po// brgyad pa'o// / rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
158b5('bum): dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos na/ mi 'jigs mi sdang skrag par mi 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen de gang lags/ bcom
158b6('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen gleng de la gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs
158b7('bum): pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu
159a1('bum): sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i gyi chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang
159a2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtog par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'du shes mi rtag ces bya bar
159a3('bum): de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs
159a4('bum): rgyas sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'du byed mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam
159a5('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces
159a6('bum): bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs
159a7('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug ste/ rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o// rab 'byor
159b1('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
159b2('bum): ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug
159b3('bum): pa'o// gang de la tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
159b4('bum): ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'du shes sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs
159b5('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos stong cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
159b6('bum): yongasu sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'du byed sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang
159b7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi
159b8('bum): rang sangs rgyas
160a1('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan
160a2('bum): thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes
160a3('bum): gnyen ni/ gang de la gzugs bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
160a4('bum): nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshor ba bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
160a5('bum): tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi
160a6('bum): 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'du shes bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
160a7('bum): nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'du byed bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
160b1('bum): tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs
160b2('bum): su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bya bar de mi migs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams
160b3('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
160b4('bum): sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i gshes gnyen ni/ gang de la gzugs zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang
160b5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshor ba zhi zhes bya bar
160b6('bum): de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas
160b7('bum): kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'du shes zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam
161a1('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o//
161a2('bum): gang de la 'du byed zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
161a3('bum): par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
161a4('bum): chos stong cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs
161a5('bum): su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la gzugs stong zhes
161a6('bum): bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa
161a7('bum): 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshor ba stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i
161b1('bum): rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang
161b2('bum): de la 'du shes stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyi chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
161b3('bum): bar nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'du byed stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
161b4('bum): ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtog par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs
161b5('bum): su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyi chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang
161b6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byo
161b7('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la gzugs mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa
162a1('bum): tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi
162a2('bum): sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshor ba mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge
162a3('bum): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o// gang
162a4('bum): de la 'du shes mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
162a5('bum): gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'du byed mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
162a6('bum): gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
162a7('bum): yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
162b1('bum): cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor
162b2('bum): 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la gzugs smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
162b3('bum): chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yod
162b4('bum): su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshor ba smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa
162b5('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'du shes smon pa
162b6('bum): med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/
162b7('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'du byed smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /
163a1('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas
163a2('bum): kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par shes pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /
163a3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub
163a4('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge
163a5('bum): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi so 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su myi 'jug pa'o// gang
163a6('bum): de la tshor ba mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad kyang mkhyen pa nyid ma
163a7('bum): gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'du shes mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs
163b1('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
163b2('bum): yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'du byed mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /
163b3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par shes pa mngon
163b4('bum): par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/
163b5('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/
163b6('bum): gang de la gzugs dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par//
163b7('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshor ba dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge
164a1('bum): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyasas yongs
164a2('bum): su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'du shes dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
164a3('bum): pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'du byed dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
164a4('bum): gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa yongs
164a5('bum): su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam
164a6('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems
164a7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes
164b1('bum): gnyen ni/ gang de la mig mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
164b2('bum): ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
164b3('bum): chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs
164b4('bum): su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad
164b5('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lce mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
164b6('bum): tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
164b7('bum): yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos gyon cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam
165a1('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o//
165a2('bum): gang de la yid mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/
165a3('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes
165a4('bum): gnyen ni/ gang de la mig sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
165a5('bum): nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs
165a6('bum): pa'i tshul gyis tshwa ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas
165a7('bum): kyi sar yongs su myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa
165b1('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lho sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi

165b3('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams

173a3('bum): cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la reg bdag
173a4('bum): med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/
173a5('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la chos bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang
173a6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub
173a7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' bo'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la gzugs zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang //
173b1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sgra zhi zhes bya bar de mi
173b2('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs
173b3('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dri zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams
173b4('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la ro zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i chub
173b5('bum): gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs
173b6('bum): su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la reg zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
173b7('bum): nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la chos zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
174a1('bum): chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang
174a2('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la gzugs stong
174a3('bum): zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/
174a4('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sgra stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /
174a5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dri stong zhes bya bar
174a6('bum): de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/
174a7('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la ro stong pa zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam
174b1('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la reg stong zhes bya bar de mi/
174b2('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs
174b3('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la chos stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam
174b4('bum): ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang
174b5('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la gzugs mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing //
174b6('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// /
174b7('bum): gang de la sgra mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par// /
175a1('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dri mtshan ma med ces bya bar

175a3('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la ro mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba tham

175a5('bum): reg mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/
175a6('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la chos mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos

180b7('bum): thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos

181a5('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
181a6('bum): ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor
181a7('bum): mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams
181b1('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
181b2('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la mig gi rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge
181b3('bum): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// /
181b4('bum): gang de la rna ba'i rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
181b5('bum): pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna'i rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med ces
181b6('bum): bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/
181b7('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lce'i rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /
182a1('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs
182a2('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus kyi rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i
182a3('bum): rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o//
182a4('bum): gang de la yid kyi rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad
182a5('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
182a6('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la mig gi rnam par shes pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs po'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge
182a7('bum): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o//
182b1('bum): gang de la rna ba'i rnam par shes pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
182b2('bum): nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna'i rnam par shes pa smon pa med ces bya bar de
182b3('bum): mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/
182b4('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lce'i rnam par shes pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge
182b5('bum): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// /
182b6('bum): gang de la lus kyi rnam par shes pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad
182b7('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yid kyi rnam par shes pa smon pa med
183a1('bum): ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
183a2('bum): gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
183a3('bum): dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la mig gi rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
183a4('bum): cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba'i
183a5('bum): rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
183a6('bum): nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna'i rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba med
183a7('bum): ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/
183b1('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sgo'i rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /
183b2('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o//
183b3('bum): gang de la lus kyi rnam par shes pa mngon par 'dra bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos skyon cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa tha
183b4('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yid kyi rnam par shes pa
183b5('bum): mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
183b6('bum): gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
183b7('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i gnyen ni/ gang de la mig gi rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i
184a1('bum): rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
184a2('bum): yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
184a3('bum): cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o//
184a4('bum): gang de la sna'i rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
184a5('bum): pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lce'i rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya bar

184b3('bum): nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
184b4('bum): chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/
184b5('bum): gang de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa

189a1('bum): gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma ga togs par/ nyan thos kyis

189b1('bum): 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam
189b2('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna'i 'dus te
189b3('bum): reg pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/
189b4('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston
189b5('bum): cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su sngor mi 'jug
189b6('bum): pa'o// gang de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs pa//
189b7('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
190a1('bum): gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang
190a2('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la mig gi
190a3('bum): 'dus te reg pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
190a4('bum): nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa mngon par 'du bya ba med
190a5('bum): ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa ma
190a6('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston
190a7('bum): cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor mi
190b1('bum): 'jug pa'o// gang de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /
190b2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus kyi
190b3('bum): 'dus te reg pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
190b4('bum): pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mngon
190b5('bum): bar 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
190b6('bum): par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
190b7('bum): dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam
191a1('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la/
191a2('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
191a3('bum): par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
191a4('bum): ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug
191a5('bum): pa'o// gang de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
191a6('bum): nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmig
191a7('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
191b1('bum): yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam
191b2('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems
191b3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cig/
191b4('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o//
191b5('bum): gang de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad
191b6('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi rtag
191b7('bum): ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang
192a1('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs

192a3('bum): su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /
192a4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa
192a5('bum): las byung ba'i tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/
192a6('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen
192a7('bum): ni/ gang de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa
192b1('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung
192b2('bum): ba'i tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan
192b3('bum): thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i

192b5('bum): yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa
192b6('bum): ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de
192b7('bum): la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa tham
193a1('bum): cang mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yid
193a2('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
193a3('bum): pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
193a4('bum): chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bdag med ces bya bar de mi gamigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa
193a5('bum): ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna
193a6('bum): ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
193a7('bum): ba nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba
193b1('bum): bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi
193b2('bum): sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i

193b4('bum): yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byang ba'i tshor ba bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa

193b6('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad
193b7('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs pa re/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sem/

194a5('bum): te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
194a6('bum): gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhi zhes bya bar
194a7('bum): de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang

196b4('bum): su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i

196b6('bum): gang de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam
196b7('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus kyi 'du
197a1('bum): te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /

197a3('bum): pa las byung ba'i tshor ba smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
197a4('bum): nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su stor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sem

197a7('bum): mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mngon par 'dub pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i
197b1('bum): rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o//
197b2('bum): gang de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /
197b3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lce'i 'dus te reg
197b4('bum): pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams
197b5('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las
197b6('bum): byung ba'i tshor ba mngon par 'du ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad
197b7('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs paro/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byu
198a1('bum): ba'i tshor ba mngon par 'du ba ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa
198a2('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub
198a3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
198a4('bum): tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa
198a5('bum): yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa
198a6('bum): ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de
198a7('bum): la sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad
198b1('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i
198b2('bum): tshor ba dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par
198b3('bum): nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dben zhes bya bar de mi
198b4('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs
198b5('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing //
198b6('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o//
198b7('bum): / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa// / bam po bcu pa'o// // rab
199a1('bum): 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba mi
199a2('bum): rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi
199a3('bum): sa'am/ sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston/
199a4('bum): cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi
199a5('bum): 'jug pa'o// gang de la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa
199a6('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zhi zhes
199a7('bum): bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang
199b1('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba
199b2('bum): thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la
199b3('bum): rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
199b4('bum): pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba smon pa med
199b5('bum): ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/
199b6('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
199b7('bum): chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi yongasu sngon
200a1('bum): mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba tham
200a2('bum): cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan
200a3('bum): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
200a4('bum): chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi so'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
200a5('bum): yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi rtag bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
200a6('bum): cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la
200a7('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
200b1('bum): ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi rtag ces bya bar de maM
200b2('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs
200b3('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i
200b4('bum): rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o//

200b6('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems
200b7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /

201a3('bum): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug
201a4('bum): pa'o// gang de la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa thams cad kyang / rnam
201a5('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la brtson 'grus kyi
201a6('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid

201b1('bum): zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos
201b2('bum): kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
201b3('bum): tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs pa re/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs
201b4('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la sbyin
201b5('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyi
201b6('bum): ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag med ces
201b7('bum): bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/
202a1('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bdag med ces bya bar de mi migs pa'i tshul

202b2('bum): bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa

202b4('bum): phyin pa zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/
202b5('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
