249b4('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngar mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
249b5('bum): tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi
249b6('bum): sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bsgom pa'i phyir de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba tham
249b7('bum): cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam pa tha
250a1('bum): mkhyen pa nyid sgom pa'i phyir/ de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams
250a2('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la byang chub bsgom pa'i phyir de mi dmigs pa'i
250a3('bum): tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi
250a4('bum): sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa//
250a5('bum): bam po bcu gnyis pa'o// // rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i gshes gnyen tu shes par bya ste//
250a6('bum): dge ba'i bshes gnyen des yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos na mi 'jigs mi sdang skrag par mi
250a7('bum): 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe
250b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos na 'jigs shing sdang la skrag par 'gyur zhing thabs mi mkhas te/ sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu lhung zhing dge ba'i bshes
250b2('bum): gnyen gyis yongs su spangs pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
250b3('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byang med par shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
250b4('bum): pa'i yid la bya ba med par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom zhing dmigs te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa des rlom sems su byed pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
250b5('bum): par yid la bya ba med par/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom zhing dmigs te/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa des rlom sems su byed pa dang rnam pa thams
250b6('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom zhing dmigs te/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa des rlom sems su byed pa dang /
250b7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom zhing dmigs te/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa des rlom sems su byed pa dang /
251a1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom zhing dmigs te/ tshul khrims kyi
251a2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa des rlom sems su byed pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom zhing dmigs te/ sbyin pa'i
251a3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa des rlom semasasu byed pa de lta bu ni/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spod pa'i thabs mi mkhas par rig par
251a4('bum): bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la
251a5('bum): bya ba med par/ gzugs nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spod
251a6('bum): pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ gzugs phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang
251a7('bum): dmigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spong ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par
251b1('bum): gzugs phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
251b2('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par gzugs stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid
251b3('bum): stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
251b4('bum): la bya ba med par/ gzugs chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasasu byed do//
251b5('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ gzugs don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed do//
251b6('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhye
251b7('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ gzugs 'dus byas stong pa nyid bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang
252a1('bum): rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/
252a2('bum): gzugs 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
252a3('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ gzugs mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar
252a4('bum): yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
252a5('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ gzugs thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmig
252a6('bum): pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam
252a7('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ gzugs dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med
252b1('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
252b2('bum): ba'i yid la bya ba med par gzugs rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
252b3('bum): sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ gzugs chos thams cad
252b4('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha ro/
252b5('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ gzugs rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs
252b6('bum): pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
252b7('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ gzugs mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang
253a1('bum): dmigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid/
253a2('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ gzugs dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la stong pa nyid
253a3('bum): kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ gzugs
253a4('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// shes rab kyi
253a5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ gzugs dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la
253a6('bum): byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sem
253a7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spong ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ tshor ba nang stong pa zhes bya bar
253b1('bum): yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyong pa'i tshe/ rnam
253b2('bum): ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ tshor ba phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong
253b3('bum): pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ tshor ba phyi nang
253b4('bum): stong zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
253b5('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ tshor ba stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid
253b6('bum): stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
253b7('bum): yid la bya ba med par/ tshor ba chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su
254a1('bum): byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par//
254a2('bum): tshor ba don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
254a3('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ tshor ba 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la
254a4('bum): byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
254a5('bum): pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ tshor ba 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
254a6('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbed pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
254a7('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ tshor ba mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs
254b1('bum): la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/
254b2('bum): tshor ba thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya ba yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
254b3('bum): sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ tshor ba dor ba med pa
254b4('bum): spong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab
254b5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par// tshor ba rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
254b6('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
254b7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ tshor ba chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad
255a1('bum): stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
255a2('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ tshor ba rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa da
255a3('bum): sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spong ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ tshor ba mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes
255a4('bum): bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod/
255a5('bum): pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ tshor ba dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med
255a6('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
255a7('bum): yid la bya ba med par/ tshor ba ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
255b1('bum): sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ tshor ba dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
255b2('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor gzhan
255b3('bum): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du shes
255b4('bum): nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
255b5('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du shes phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa
255b6('bum): nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
255b7('bum): bya ba med par/ 'du shes phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do//
256a1('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du shes stong pa nyid stong pa zhes
256a2('bum): bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
256a3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du shes chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmig
256a4('bum): la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/
256a5('bum): 'du shes don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes
256a6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du shes 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmig
256a7('bum): pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams
256b1('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du shes 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmig
256b2('bum): la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/
256b3('bum): 'du shes mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem
256b4('bum): su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du shes thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa
256b5('bum): zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha
256b6('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du shes dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i
256b7('bum): tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
257a1('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du shes rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid
257a2('bum): kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
257a3('bum): med par/ 'du shes chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
257a4('bum): sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du shes rang gi mtshan nyid
257a5('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi
257a6('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du shes mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmig
257a7('bum): pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
257b1('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du shes dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmig
257b2('bum): la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/
257b3('bum): 'du shes ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes
257b4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du shes dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/
257b5('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
257b6('bum): dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du byed nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
257b7('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
258a1('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du byed phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong
258a2('bum): pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du byed phyi nang stong pa zhes
258a3('bum): bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
258a4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du byed stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid
258a5('bum): kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
258a6('bum): la bya ba med par/ 'du byed chen po stong pa zhes bya b.raro yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem
258a7('bum): su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du byed don dam pa stong pa zhes
258b1('bum): bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
258b2('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du byed 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i
258b3('bum): tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams
258b4('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'dus byed 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs la'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong
258b5('bum): pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang /
258b6('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du byed mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang
258b7('bum): dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
259a1('bum): yid la bya ba med par/ 'du byed thogs dang ba ma med pa stong ba zhes bya ba med la byed de/ dmigs pa'i chul kyis thog ma dpas
259a2('bum): med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
259a3('bum): ldan pa'i yid bya ba med par/ 'du byed dor ba med pa spong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid
259a4('bum): kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du byed rang bzhin
259a5('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
259a6('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du byed chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul
259a7('bum): gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
259b1('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du byed rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid
259b2('bum): kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du byed mi dmig
259b3('bum): pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha
259b4('bum): rol tu phyin pa la sbyong ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du byed dngos po med pa spong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed do// dmigs
259b5('bum): pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams
259b6('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du byed ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/
259b7('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyong ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du byed/
260a1('bum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed do/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/
260a2('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
260a3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par shes pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
260a4('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom/ sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
260a5('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par shes pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa
260a6('bum): nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par
260a7('bum): shes pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab
260b1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par shes pa chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmig
260b2('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
260b3('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par shes pa chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmig la/
260b4('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/
260b5('bum): rnam par shes pa don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su
260b6('bum): byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par shes pa 'dus byas stong pa
260b7('bum): zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha
261a1('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par shes pa 'dus ma byas
261a2('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha
261a3('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par shes pa mtha' las 'das pa steng pa zhes bya bar yid la byed
261a4('bum): de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
261a5('bum): tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par shes pa thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul
261a6('bum): gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spong ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
261a7('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par shes pa dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang /
261b1('bum): dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spong ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
261b2('bum): med par/ rnam par shes pa rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
261b3('bum): sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par shes pa chos thams
261b4('bum): cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// ri shes
261b5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par shes pa rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid
261b6('bum): la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
261b7('bum): pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul
262a1('bum): gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
262a2('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par shes pa dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmig
262a3('bum): ba'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam
262a4('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid
262a5('bum): stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
262a6('bum): ba nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par shes pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa
262a7('bum): nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
262b1('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ mig nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i
262b2('bum): tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
262b3('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ mig phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong
262b4('bum): pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/
262b5('bum): mig phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
262b6('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ mig stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya
262b7('bum): bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu/
263a1('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ mig chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la
263a2('bum): byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
263a3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ mig don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid
263a4('bum): kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la
263a5('bum): la bya ba med par/ mig 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yidal byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis
263a6('bum): kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ mig 'dus ma
263a7('bum): byas stong pa zhi ba la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol
263b1('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ mig mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs
263b2('bum): pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
263b3('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ mig thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med
263b4('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spong ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
263b5('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ mig dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa
263b6('bum): nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ mig
263b7('bum): rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de// dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab
264a1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ mig chos thams cad stong
264a2('bum): pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshug gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab
264a3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid
264a4('bum): la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
264a5('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ mig mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul
264a6('bum): gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams
264a7('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bya med par/ migango bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmig la/
264b1('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/
264b2('bum): mig dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong
264b3('bum): pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu bra la spyod pa'i tshe/
264b4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rna ba nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid
264b5('bum): kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
264b6('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rna ba phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid
264b7('bum): kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/
265a1('bum): rna ba phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
265a2('bum): sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rna ba stong pa nyid stong
265a3('bum): ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol
265a4('bum): tu phyin pa la spong ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rna ba chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
265a5('bum): chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmig la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
265a6('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rna ba don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang
265a7('bum): rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rna ba 'dus byas stong pa
265b1('bum): zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol
265b2('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rna ba 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul
265b3('bum): gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
265b4('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rna ba mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang
265b5('bum): dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spong ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la
265b6('bum): bya ba med par/ rna ba thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid
265b7('bum): kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rna ba dor ba
266a1('bum): med pa stong pa nyid bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang
266a2('bum): rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyong ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rna ba rang bzhin stong
266a3('bum): pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
266a4('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rna ba chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i
266a5('bum): tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams
266a6('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rna ba rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid
266a7('bum): kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
266b1('bum): la bya ba med par/ rna ba mi dmigs pa stong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
266b2('bum): sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rna ba dngos po med pa
266b3('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
266b4('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rna ba ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la
266b5('bum): byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
266b6('bum): po'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rna ba dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs
266b7('bum): pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems
267a1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spong ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med
267a2('bum): par/ sna nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmig la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab
267a3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sna phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs
267a4('bum): pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
267a5('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sna phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis
267a6('bum): kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sna stong pa nyid stong /
267a7('bum): pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol
267b1('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sna chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/
267b2('bum): chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
267b3('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sna don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis
267b4('bum): kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la smod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang yid la bya ba med par/ sna 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya
267b5('bum): bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'das byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
267b6('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sna 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma
267b7('bum): byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
268a1('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sna mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las/
268a2('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
268a3('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sna thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyis kyang
268a4('bum): dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
268a5('bum): med par/ sna dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems
268a6('bum): su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sna rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar
268a7('bum): yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
268b1('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sna chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i rdul gyis chos thams
268b2('bum): cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
268b3('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sna rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong
268b4('bum): pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/
268b5('bum): mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
268b6('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sna dngos po med pa stong ba zhes bya bar yid/
268b7('bum): la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/
269a1('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sna ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
269a2('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam
269a3('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sna dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos
269a4('bum): po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
269a5('bum): po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lce nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
269a6('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
269a7('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/
269b1('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/
269b2('bum): lce phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab
269b3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lce stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmig
269b4('bum): pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams
269b5('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lce chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong
269b6('bum): pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lce don dam/
269b7('bum): bstong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don ngas paslong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi sa
270a1('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lce 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar ying/
270a2('bum): ma byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byeng do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
270a3('bum): tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lce 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas
270a4('bum): stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
270a5('bum): pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lce mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong
270a6('bum): pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/
270a7('bum): thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
270b1('bum): sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lce dor ba med pa stong pa/
270b2('bum): zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi
270b3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lce rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs
270b4('bum): pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams
270b5('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lce chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid
270b6('bum): kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
270b7('bum): pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lce rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis kyang dmigs la/
271a1('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
271a2('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lce mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/
271a3('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spong pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/
271a4('bum): lce dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems
271a5('bum): su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lce ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes
271a6('bum): bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol
271a7('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lce dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
271b1('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems
271b2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lus nang stong pa
271b3('bum): zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
271b4('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lus phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul
271b5('bum): gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
271b6('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lus phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis
271b7('bum): kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lus stong
272a1('bum): pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su
272a2('bum): byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lus chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la
272a3('bum): byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
272a4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lus don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa
272a5('bum): nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
272a6('bum): ba'i yid la bya ba med par/ lus 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis
272a7('bum): kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyong ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'dus ma byas
272b1('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha
272b2('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lus mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
272b3('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
272b4('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lus thog ma dang tha ma med pa spyong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs
272b5('bum): ngo'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe//
272b6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lus dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa
272b7('bum): stong pa nyid kyang dmigs pa/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
273a1('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lus rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong
273a2('bum): pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
273a3('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lus chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/
273a4('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/
273a5('bum): lus rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem
273a6('bum): su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lus mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes
273a7('bum): bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab
273b1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lus dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs
273b2('bum): pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
273b3('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lus ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed do/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/
273b4('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lus
273b5('bum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang
273b6('bum): rlom sems su byed do// / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la stong phrag brgya pa
273b7('bum): bam po'i rgyas sum pa'o// / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
274a1('bum): pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ yid nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs
274a2('bum): pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la// stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
274a3('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ yid phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis
274a4('bum): kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ yid phyi nang stong
274a5('bum): pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
274a6('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ yid stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa
274a7('bum): nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
274b1('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ yid chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang /
274b2('bum): rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ yid don dam pa stong
274b3('bum): pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha
274b4('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ yid 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i/
274b5('bum): tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad/

275a1('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong

275a3('bum): thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// /
275a4('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ yid dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
275a5('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
275a6('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ yid rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmig
275a7('bum): la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par//
275b1('bum): yid chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
275b2('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ yid rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed
275b3('bum): de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
275b4('bum): ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ yid mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi
275b5('bum): dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
275b6('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ yid dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/
275b7('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/
276a1('bum): yid ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid
276a2('bum): kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ yid dngos po
276a3('bum): med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su
276a4('bum): byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
276a5('bum): yid la bya ba med par/ gzugs nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su
276a6('bum): byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu pal spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ gzugs phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la
276a7('bum): byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyebye stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam
276b1('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ gzugs phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/
276b2('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ gzug
276b3('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi
276b4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ gzugs chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i
276b5('bum): tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab phyi rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
276b6('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ gzugs don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis
276b7('bum): kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ gzugs 'dus byas stong pa zhes/
277a1('bum): bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes
277a2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ gzugs 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmig
277a3('bum): pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod n+te/ rnam pa thams cad
277a4('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ gzugs mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid
277a5('bum): kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la
277a6('bum): bya ba med par/ gzugs thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong
277a7('bum): pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ gzug
277b1('bum): dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes
277b2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ gzugs rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs
277b3('bum): pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
277b4('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ gzugs chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang
277b5('bum): dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med
277b6('bum): par/ gzugs rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang
277b7('bum): rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ gzugs mi dmig
278a1('bum): pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
278a2('bum): sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ gzugs dngos
278a3('bum): po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
278a4('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ gzugs ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la
278a5('bum): byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
278a6('bum): pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ gzugs dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs
278a7('bum): pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
278b1('bum): dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sgra nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
278b2('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa tham
278b3('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sgra phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid
278b4('bum): kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sgra phyi nang
278b5('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
278b6('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sgra stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
278b7('bum): stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
279a1('bum): pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sgra chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/
279a2('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sgra
279a3('bum): don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// / de shes
279a4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sgra 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
279a5('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
279a6('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sgra 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid
279a7('bum): kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
279b1('bum): la bya ba med par/ sgra mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis
279b2('bum): kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sgra thog ma dang tha ma
279b3('bum): med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
279b4('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spong ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sgra dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
279b5('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
279b6('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sgra rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmig
279b7('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
280a1('bum): med par/ sna chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la//
280a2('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/
280a3('bum): sgra rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su
280a4('bum): byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sgra mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar
280a5('bum): yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
280a6('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sgra dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
280a7('bum): dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
280b1('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ snga ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid
280b2('bum): kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ bla dngos po
280b3('bum): med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems
280b4('bum): su byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
280b5('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ dri nang spong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang spong ba nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang
280b6('bum): rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyong ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ dri phyi stong pa zhes
280b7('bum): bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i/
281a1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ dri phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
281a2('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
