380a2('bum): skye ba mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems
380a3('bum): su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye ba dngos po
380a4('bum): med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed
380a5('bum): do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye ba ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes
380a6('bum): bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi
380a7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye ba dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar
380b1('bum): yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
380b2('bum): 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
380b3('bum): yid la bya ba med par/ rga shi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis
380b4('bum): kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/
380b5('bum): rga shi phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyang rlom sems su byed do// de
380b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rga shi phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar
380b7('bum): yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
381a1('bum): byin pa la spyod pa'iH/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ nashi stong
381a2('bum): nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlos sems su byed
381a3('bum): do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ na shi chen po stong
381a4('bum): ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs po'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
381a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rga shi don ngom pa stong pa zhes
381a6('bum): bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs pa/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes
381a7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rga shi 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang
381a8('bum): na 'tshad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yings bya ba snyed pa
381b1('bum): dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
381b2('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rga shi 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa
381b3('bum): nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
381b4('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rga shi mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa
381b5('bum): stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams
381b6('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rga she thog ma dang bla ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul
381b7('bum): gyis 'og ma dang ba ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
382a1('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ ga shi dor ba med bzong pa
382a2('bum): zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab
382a3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rga shi rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
382a4('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyong ba'i tshe
382a5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rga shi chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
382a6('bum): thams cad stong pa nyid kyang ngamigs sa/ stong pa nyid kyil gang chos sems su byed do// shes rab rtse pha rol tu phyin pa sa spyod pa'i / rnam pa sa
382a7('bum): cad khyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ na ge rang gis can nyid kyang ba zhes bya bar yid la byed do// dmags pa'i chus kyis sa
382b1('bum): nang pa nyid kyang rigasas/ stong ba nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// dashes rab sdel rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i ma/ rnam pa thams cadangs phyin/
382b2('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rga shi mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang
382b3('bum): dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shesarab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
382b4('bum): pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rga shi dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong
382b5('bum): pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/
382b6('bum): rga shi ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
382b7('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rga shi dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
383a1('bum): pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/
383a2('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam
383a3('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshus gyis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa de dag kyang
383a4('bum): dmigs la/ sA dag bla srong dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dag kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
383a5('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ yang dag par spong ba rnams sgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yang dag par spong ba de dag kyang dmigs la/
383a6('bum): yang das par spong ba de dag gis pang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa tsho/ rnam thathams cad ma khyen pa nyid dang ma
383a7('bum): yid la bya ba med par/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa de dag kyang dmigs la/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
383b1('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dbang po de dag kyang dmigs la/
383b2('bum): de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/
383b3('bum): dbang po rnams sgom ste/ dbang po de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
383b4('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ stobs rnams sgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stobs de dag kyang dmigs la/ stobs de dag gis kyang
383b5('bum): rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ byang chub
383b6('bum): kyi yan lag rnam sgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub kyi yan lag de dag kyang dmigs la/ byang chub kyi yan la de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed/
383b7('bum): do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'phags pa'i las
383b8('bum): yan lag brgyad pa bsgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'phags lam yan lag brgyad pa de yang dmigs la/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa
384a1('bum): des kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
384a2('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'phags pa'i bden pa de dag kyang dmigs la/
384a3('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
384a4('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ bsam gtan rnams sgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bsam gtan de dag kyang dmigs la/ bsam gtan de dag
384a5('bum): gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par
384a6('bum): tshad med pa rnams sgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis tshad med pa de dag kyang dmigs la/ tshad med pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes
384a7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ gzugs med pa'i snyom par 'jug pa rnams
384b1('bum): sgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag kyang dmigs la/ gzugs med pa'i snyom par 'jug pa de dag gis kyang
384b2('bum): rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam
384b3('bum): par thar pa rnams sgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam par thar pa de dag kyang dmigs la/ rnam par thar pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
384b4('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
384b5('bum): par 'jug pa rnams sgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag kyang dmigs la/ mthar gyis gnas
384b6('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
384b7('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med sgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul
385a1('bum): gyis rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa de dag kyang dmigs la/ rnam par
385a2('bum): thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam
385a3('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ mngon par shes pa rnams sgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mngon par shes pa
385a4('bum): de dag kyang dmigs la/ mngon par shes pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
385a5('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ ting nge 'dzin rnams skyom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ting nge 'dzin de dag kyang dmigs
385a6('bum): la/ ting dri 'dzin de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
385a7('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams sgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gzungs kyi sgo de dag kyang dmigs la/ gzungs
385b1('bum): kyi sgo de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la
385b2('bum): bya ba med par/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs de dag kyang dmigs la/
385b3('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
385b4('bum): ba nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ mi 'jigs pa rnams sgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'jigs pa de dag kyang dmigs la/ mi 'jog
385b5('bum): pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la
385b6('bum): bya ba med par/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis so so yang dag par rig pa de dag kyang dmigs la/ so so yang
385b7('bum): dag par rig pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
386a1('bum): 'angs bya ba da pang / snying rjechen po smram ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis snying rje chen po de yang dmigs la/
386a2('bum): rje chen po des kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyong ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/
386a3('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang dmigs la/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
386a4('bum): 'dres pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
386a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa// 3// bam po bco kyang nga'o// / rab 'byor
386a6('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spyod pa'i tshe/ de ltar thabs mi mkhas pas ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
386a7('bum): pa bstan pa 'di bos na/ 'jigs shing sdang la skrag par 'gyur ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po//
386b1('bum): dmi pa'i rmo sa pa'i yongs su zin cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos na/ 'jigs shing sdang la skrag par 'gyur te/ sdig pa'i grogs
386b2('bum): po'i sug par lhung ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ sdig pa'i
386b3('bum): grogs po ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa mos pa med par byed cing zlog par byed pa'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa mos
386b4('bum): ba med par byed cing zlog par byed pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa mos pa med par byed cing zlog par byed pa'o// bzod pa'i pha
386b5('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa mos pa med par byed cing thog par byed pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa mos pa med par byed cing zlog par
386b6('bum): byed pa'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa mos pa med par byed cing zlog par byed pa ste/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa sa
386b7('bum): yin/ 'di ni tshim ma yin/ 'di ni 'dul ba ma yin gyis/ 'dil bslob par bya'i mtsho'o// mdo sde 'di dag ni rang 'bor byas pa ste/ 'di dag
387a1('bum): ni mnyan par mi bya'o// gzung bar mi bya'o// bcang bar mi bya'o// klag par mi bya'o// kun chub par/
387a2('bum): mi bya'o// tshul bzhin du yid la mi bya'o// 'di dag ni gzhan la bstan par mi bya'o// zhes zer ba 'di ni/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems
387a3('bum): dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs po ni 'di ltar bdud
387a4('bum): sdig can/ sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du byas pa dag/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug la zlog cing
387a5('bum): mos pa med par byed de/ rig kyi bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci
387a6('bum): zhig bya/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ tshul khrims
387a7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod lo ci zhig bya/ zhes zer ba 'ong ngo zhes bdud kyi las
387b1('bum): mi ston/ bdud kyi nyes pa mi ston pa 'di ni/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i grogs por rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang /
387b2('bum): bdud sdig can dag sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ nyan thos dang ldan pa'i mdo dang /
387b3('bum): dbyangs kyis bskrad pa dang / lung bstan po dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang / ched du brjod pa dang / gling gzhi dang / 'di ltar 'das pa dang / skye ba'i
387b4('bum): rabs dang / shin tu rgyas pa dang / chos rmad du byung ba dang / rtog pa brjod pa dang / gtan la bab pa bstan pa dag ston to// 'grel to// rnam
387b5('bum): par 'byed do// gsal bar byed do// yongs su ston to// zhes bdud kyi las rnam pa 'di lta bu dag mi sna mi ston pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
387b6('bum): dpa' chen po'i 'dud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa'
387b7('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ 'di skad du rig kyi bu khyod la ni/ byang chub kyi sems kyang chung zad kyang med/ khyod ni phyir mi ldog pa'ang ma yin/
388a1('bum): khyod ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus so zhes zer ba 'di lta bu'i
388a2('bum): bdud kyi las dag mi smra mi ston pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud
388a3('bum): sdig to can dag sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ 'di skad du rig kyi bu/ mig ni
388a4('bum): bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // rna ba ni bdag gam bdeg gis stong ngo // sna ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // lce ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //
388a5('bum): lus ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // yid ni bdag gam bdag gi stong ngo // gzugs ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // sgra ni bdag gam bdag gis stong
388a6('bum): dri ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // ro ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // reg ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // chos ni bdag gas bdag gis
388a7('bum): mig gi rnam par shes pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni bdag gam gis stong ngo // sna'i rnam par shes pa ni bdag gam
388a8('bum): bad
388b1('bum): bdag gis stong ngo // lce'i rnam par shes pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // yid kyi rnam
388b2('bum): par shes pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ni bdag gam bdag gis
388b3('bum): stong ngo // sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // lce'i 'dus te reg pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ni
388b4('bum): bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni bdag gam
388b5('bum): bdag gis stong ngo // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni bdag gam
388b6('bum): bdag gis stong ngo // lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni bdag gam
388b7('bum): bdag gis stong ngo // yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // sa'i khams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //
389a1('bum): chu ge khams ni 'dag pas bdag gis spong ngo // me'i khams ni bdag gas bdag gis stong ngo // rlung gi khams
389a2('bum): bdag gas bdag gis stong ngo // rnam pa'i khams ni bdag gas bdag gis stong ngo // rnam par shes pa'i khams ni bdag gis bdag gis song ngo // sa mi
389a3('bum): bani bdag gas bdag gis stong ngo // 'du byed ni bdag gas bdag gis stong ngo // rnam par shes pa ni bdag gas bdag gis song ngo // ming dang gsu
389a4('bum): ni bdag gas bdag gis stong ngo // skye mchod drug ni bdag gas padag gis stong ngo // reg pa ni bdag gas bdag gis stong ngo // tshor ba ni bdag
389a5('bum): gam bdag gis stong ngo // sred pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // len pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // srid pa ni bdag gam pa dag gis
389a6('bum): stong ngo // skye ba ni bdag gas bdag gis stong ngo // na shi ni bdag gas bdag gis song ngo // sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni bdag gas bdag gis stong ngo //
389a7('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bdag gas bdag gis stong ngo // bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
389b1('bum): nga / na smyin pa gags padas / // she
389b2('bum): na pa ni bdagags padag gis byed du/ na ba nyid ni bdug gas pa ge gis stong // slong panyin ni bdagags padag zhes dang /
389b3('bum): byin stong pa nyid ni bdag gas bdag gis slong ngo // stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // chen po stong pa nyid ni bdag gas bdag
389b4('bum): gos stong ngo // don dam pa stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis skyong ngo // 'dus ma byas
389b5('bum): stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // thogs dang ba ma med pa stong pa
389b6('bum): nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag
389b7('bum): gis stong ngo // chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag
390a1('bum): gis stong ngo // mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // dngos po med pa stong pa nyid
390a2('bum): ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag
390a3('bum): gis stong ngo // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // yang dag par spong ba rnams ni bdag gam bdag gsi stong ngo //
390a4('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // dbang po rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // stobs rnams ni bdag gam
390a5('bum): bdag gis stong ngo // byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // 'phags pa'i lam ldan lag brgyad pa ni bdag gam
390a6('bum): bdag gis stong ngo // 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // bsam gtan rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //
390a7('bum): tshad med pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis steng ngo // gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // rnam par
390b1('bum): thar pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // rnam par thar
390b2('bum): pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // mngon par shes pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //
390b3('bum): ting nge 'dzin rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnam
390b4('bum): ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // mi 'jigs pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis
390b5('bum): stong ngo // snying rje chen po ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // de ltar bdag
390b6('bum): dang bdag gis stong na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas te yang ci zhig bya/ zhes zer ba de lta bu'i bdud
390b7('bum): kyi las dag mi smra mi ston pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grog so por rig par bya'o// ra
391a1('bum): 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag sangs rgyas kyi cha byang du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
391a2('bum): chen po'i drung du byin te/ 'di skad du rigs kyi bu shar phyogs ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang byang chub sems dpa' dang nyan thos rnams kyis stong ste/ 'a
391a3('bum): la sangs rgyas shes bya ba yang med do// byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba yang med do// nyan thos ces bya ba med do// de bzhin du lho phyogs dang /
391a4('bum): phyogs dang byang phyogs dang 'og dang skyeng dag kyang stong ste/ phyogs bcu kun kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan
391a5('bum): bos rnams kyis stong pas/ 'di la sangs rgyas shes bya ba yang med/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba yang med/ nyan pos shes bya ba
391a6('bum): yang med do// zhes zer ba 'di lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag mi sgra mi smon pa 'ad ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig po'i grogs
391a7('bum): por rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag nyan thos kyi mabyad du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
391b1('bum): be'i drung du phyin te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba las zlog cing nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bar
391b2('bum): 'dems shing rjes su ston pa de lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag sgra mi ston pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs par
391b3('bum): rin par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag mkhan po dang / slob dpon gyicha byang du byas shing byang chub sems dpa
391b4('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa las zlog cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
391b5('bum): yid la bya ba las bzlog ste/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams lo sbyor ba dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams la sbyor ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi
391b6('bum): rkang pa rnams la sbyor ba dang / dbang po rnams la sbyor ba dang / stobs rnams la sbyor ba dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la sbyor
391b7('bum): ba dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brkyang pa la sbyar ba dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la sbyor bo dang / bsam gtan rnamams
392a1('bum): / sbyor ba dang / tshad med pa rnams la sbyor ba dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la sbyor
392a2('bum): ba dang / rnam par thar pa rnams la sbyor ba dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la sbyor ba dang / stong pa nyid dang mtshan
392a3('bum): ma med pa dang smon pa med pa'i chos rnams la sbyor zhing / rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de ltar chos de dag yongs su sgoms la nyan thos kyi sa mngon tu gyis shig/
392a4('bum): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyis khyod la ci zhig bya zhes zer ba de lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag mi smra mi ston pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'
392a5('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag pha dang ma'i cha byad du byas shing / byang chub
392a6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ 'di skad du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas pas khyod la
392a7('bum): ci zhig pa/ de'i don tu bskal pa tshwa med grangs med par 'khor na ba na 'khor zhing / rka lag dang mgo gcad pa tshad med pas nyon mos par 'gyur gyis
392b1('bum): gang la rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byar yod pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon tu byar yod pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras
392b2('bum): bu mngon tu byar yod pa dang / dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu mngon tu byar yod pa de la brtson par gyis shig ces zer ba de lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag
392b3('bum): mi sgra mi ston pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud
392b4('bum): sdig to can dag dge slong gi cha byad du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar
392b5('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang /
392b6('bum): mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
392b7('bum): ston pa dang / tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar dmigs po'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya
392b8('bum): rab sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang/
393a1('bum): pa dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang /

410b2('bum): ba'i rnam par shes pa'i gnas med do// sna'i rnam par shes pa'i gnas med do// lce'i rnam par shes pa'i gnas med do// lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i gnas
410b3('bum): med do// yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
410b4('bum): spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i gnas med do// rna ba'i
410b5('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i gnas med do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i gnas med do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i gnas med do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i gnas
410b6('bum): med do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
410b7('bum): spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i gnas
411a1('bum): med do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i gnas med do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
411a2('bum): tshor ba'i gnas med do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i gnas med do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i gnas med do// yid
411a3('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
411a4('bum): spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di la ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu ma rig pa la gnas med do// 'du byed
411a5('bum): gnas med do// rnam par shes pa la gnas med do// ming dang gzugs la gnas med do// skye mched drug la gnas med do// reg pa la gnas
411a6('bum): med do// tshor ba la gnas med do// sred pa la gnas med do// len pa la gnas med do// srid pa la gnas med do// skye ba la gnas
411a7('bum): med do// rga shi la gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
411b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
411b2('bum): gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshig gi don med do// rab
411b3('bum): 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu
411b4('bum): mi'i skyes bu brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu mo'i skyes bu bsam gtan
411b5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshig
411b6('bum): gi don med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i rnyo gi don med do// rab
411b7('bum): 'byor 'dis med per na/ klu ma'i skye so bron nga thong ba nyid ma spyod pa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'dis sri dpe na pa sgyu mo'i skyes bu
412a1('bum): phyi stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu phyi nang stong pa nyid
412a2('bum): la spyod pa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshig gi don med do// rab
412a3('bum): 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu chen po stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i
412a4('bum): skyes bu don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod
412a5('bum): pa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor
412a6('bum): 'di sa ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bum pa' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu
412a7('bum): ma'i skyes bu 'og ma dang the ma med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu dor ba med pa
412b1('bum): stong ba nyid ma spyod pa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'dis ste dper na/ sgyu sa'i skyes bu rang bzhin spong ba nyid la spyod pa'i tshig gi ma sa
412b2('bum): do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di la ste
412b3('bum): dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu
412b4('bum): mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la spyod
412b5('bum): pa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu mi'i skyes bu ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor
412b6('bum): 'di la skye dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes ba nyid stong pa nyid la spyod de'i tshig gi don skyed do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems
412b7('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'dis ste dper na/ sU
413a1('bum): ga ga 'a rnams na na ma / rang 'bya sa sa
413a2('bum): sgyu ma'i skyes bu yang dag par spong ba rnams la spyod pa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams
413a3('bum): la spyod pa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta skye dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu dbang po rnams la skyod pa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor
413a4('bum): 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu stobs rnams la spyod pa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu byang chub
413a5('bum): kyi yan lag rnams la spyod pa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa spyod
413a6('bum): ba'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems
413a7('bum): dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di ste ste dpeng na/ lbu ba'i skyes bu 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshig gi don med do//
413b1('bum): na na
413b2('bum): tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byung 'di sa ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu gzugs sang ba'i snyoms par 'jug pa
413b3('bum): rnams pa spyod pa'i tshig gi dzin med do// rab 'byor 'dis ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu rnas par byur ba brgyad ste spyod pa'i tshig gi don mod do//
413b4('bum): ra'abyor 'di lta ste dpe na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu ma par gyis gnas pa'i rnams par 'jug pa dgul spyod pa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'a
413b5('bum): 'di lto ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu rnams thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa la spyod pa'i tshig gi don med do//
413b6('bum): rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di la ste dper na/
413b7('bum): ma'i skyes bu ting nge 'dzini rnams la spyod pa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu gzungs kyi sgo rnams la smrang
414a1('bum): pa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
414a2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams
414a3('bum): la spyod pa'i tshig gi don med de// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i mi 'jigs pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshig gi don med do// rab
414a4('bum): 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/
414a5('bum): sgyu ma'i skyes bu byams pa chen po la spyod pa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu snying rje chen po la spyod pa'i
414a6('bum): tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa be co brgyad la spyod pa'i tshig gi don med de
414a7('bum): rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do//
414b1('bum): rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gzugs la gnas med do//
414b2('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
414b3('bum): pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par

414b5('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de
414b6('bum): bzhin gshesas pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes la gnas med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'du shes de med pa'i
414b7('bum): phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lo spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'

415a7('bum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mig la gnas med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mig de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de
415b1('bum): bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rang

419a4('bum): de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems

419a7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// ra
419b1('bum): 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la gnas med do//
419b2('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
419b3('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
419b4('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la gnas med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mig gi 'dus te
419b5('bum): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
419b6('bum): spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzog
419b7('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la gnas med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba
420a1('bum): de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
420a2('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
420a3('bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la gnas med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba
420a4('bum): de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems
420a5('bum): dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi lce'i 'dus
420a6('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la gnas med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor
420a7('bum): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab
420b1('bum): 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la
420b2('bum): gnas med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems
420b3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/
420b4('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yid 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la gnas med do// de ci'i
420b5('bum): phyir zhe na/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
420b6('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
420b7('bum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ma rig pa la gnas med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ma rig pa de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de
421a1('bum): bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i

421a4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
421a5('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rnam par shes pa la gnas med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rnam par shes pa de med pa'i phyir te/ rab
421a6('bum): 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do//
421a7('bum): rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs po'i sangs rgyas kyi ming dang gzugs la gnas med do//

421b5('bum): s+ho ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi reg pa la gnas med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/

427a6('bum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu

427b2('bum): phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don

427b6('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la gnas med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rdzu 'phrul gyi
427b7('bum): rkang pa de dag med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub

428a3('bum): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab
428a4('bum): 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi stobs rnams la gnas med do// de
428a5('bum): ci'i phyir zhe na/ stobs de dag med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
428a6('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
428a7('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la gnas med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub kyi yan lag de dag
428b1('bum): med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i
428b2('bum): tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi lam la gnas
428b3('bum): med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lam de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
428b4('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
428b5('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la gnas med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'phags pa'i bden pa de dag med pa'i
428b6('bum): phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don
428b7('bum): med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bsam gtan rnams la
429a1('bum): gnas med do// de ci'i phyir zhen/ bsam gtan de dag med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de
429a2('bum): bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor
429a3('bum): 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi tshad med pa rnams la gnas med do// de
429a4('bum): ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshad med pa de dag med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
429a5('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig go don med do// rab 'byor 'odadi lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
429a6('bum): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gzugs med pa'i snyoms 'jug pa la gnas med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
429a7('bum): 'jug pa de dag med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
429b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
429b2('bum): sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa rnams la gnas med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rnam par thar ba de dag med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du
429b3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di
429b4('bum): lho ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
429b5('bum): la gnas med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du
429b6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor
429b7('bum): 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
430a1('bum): mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la gnas med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rnam par thar
430a2('bum): pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems
430a3('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs
430a4('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mngon par shes pa de
430a5('bum): dag med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i
430a6('bum): tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin
430a7('bum): la ga nas med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de dag med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
430b1('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs
430b2('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gzungs kyi sgo rnams la gnas med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzungs kyi sgo de dag
430b3('bum): med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems
430b4('bum): dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi de bzhin
430b5('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la gnas med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs de dag med pa'i phyir te/
430b6('bum): rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do//
430b7('bum): rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mi 'jigs pa rnams la gnas
431a1('bum): med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mi 'jigs pa de dag med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor
431a2('bum): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don
431a3('bum): med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs po'i sangs rgyas kyi so so yang dag par
431a4('bum): rig pa rnams la gnas med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ so so yang dag par rig pa de dag med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de
431a5('bum): bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don
431a6('bum): med do// rab 'byor 'di sa ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcos pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
431a7('bum): rgyas kyi snying rje chen po la gnas med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ snying rje chen po de dag med pa'i phyir te/
431b1('bum): rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha
431b2('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i// byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/
431b3('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
431b4('bum): pa bco brgyad la gnas med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
431b5('bum): sangs rgyakyi chos ma 'dres pa de dag med pa'i phyir te/
431b6('bum): rab 'byor
432a1('bum): de zhen du
432a2('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen //
432a3('bum): su pas spyod pa'i byang chubasams dang 'i sa gi don da do//
432a4('bum): legs so// gung // dag no//
